108634010.baseEffect_:

108634010.baseFlair_: Hey, can I make you my bloodkin too? —Vania, Vampire Princess

900634020.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
900634020.baseFlair_: Finally... Allow me to revel in this battle. I feel most alive when dancing between life and death—I want for nothing else! Come, waltz with me. Lose yourself in the thrill. I do hope you won't give me a lackluster performance.

900634030.baseFlair_: I shall join the fray. Even if it does worry me so... You see—fragile is the steel flower which wilts upon a single screw. Rough treatment just doesn't become me. Sigh. I suppose I'll just have to rise past all that. And enjoy what life I've got left.

900644050.baseEffect_:

Put a The Nightmare Begins, Bloody Claw, and Cursed Aura into your hand.
If you've played any other A Horrible Nights this match, deal 3 damage to all allies and enemies (excluding Urias, Final Vampires) instead of discarding and putting cards into your hand.
900644050.baseFlair_: The vampire bares his teeth in a sudden smirk. The curtains have risen, and now, the dance of battle is about to begin.

109623010.baseEffect_:

----------
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.

109623010.baseFlair_: Just as sleep finds itself wrapped in dreams, you are embraced by the night. If you cower in fear of the darkness, the night will forgive your transgressions. But, alas, you seem none the wiser of its terrors—and there is only one end suitable for the ignorant.

101611040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to both leaders.
101611040.baseFlair_: A shadow born from human hatred. This parasite warps the spirit and then feeds on it, sapping life force to boost its own dark power.
101611040.evoFlair_: As long as hatred remains in the world, dark shadows will grow ever longer and more powerful. They will one day manifest as a pure terror condemning all light and hope to the darkness.

117611020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Last Words: Give +1/+1 to a random allied follower.
117611020.baseFlair_: I'll let you bloodsuckers in on a secret. Humans may be weak, but we don't fly solo. Mankind stands united, and that spells your inevitable doom.
117611020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117611020.evoFlair_: I'm not naive. I know one arrow isn't going to faze you fiends. But if you think that's going to stop me from letting off these bolts, think again.

119611010.baseEffect_:
Drain.
Fanfare: If Wrath is not active for you, deal 1 damage to your leader. Otherwise, gain +2/+2 and Rush.
119611010.baseFlair_: Has the kiss of my rapier sated your desire? Or do you perhaps want more? Come closer, and I'll make you blush from head to toe.
119611010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119611010.evoFlair_: My blade aches with desire for you, even now. Ahh, we drank deep did we not? Or was it the other way around? One thing led to another, and now it's all flown out of my head.

900611010.baseFlair_: A shadow moves soundlessly through the black night, seeking out its master's enemies.
900611010.evoFlair_: A fanged shadow glides soundlessly through the black night, its master's enemies in sight.

900611020.baseFlair_:
"It doesn't look very tasty."
"Not worth the effort to kill it."
"I don't think so either—but let's go ahead and do it in!"
—The three gorgon sisters
900611020.evoFlair_:
"It looks gross. I'll pass."
"I have no interest in it either, I'm afraid."
"Okay! Well, then leave it to my little pet!"
—The three gorgon sisters

101621060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 if Vengeance is active for you.
101621060.baseFlair_: Only a bloodbath of unforgettable proportions will be enough to awaken this demonsword. So I'll kill and kill some more.
101621060.evoFlair_: The tide of blood and death is rising, and the time of the blade's awakening is upon us. So let us continue the slaughter until rivers of blood flow beneath mountains of flesh!

108621010.baseEffect_: If you have at least 5 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Buller, Saintly Maiden or Buller, Dark Maiden.
108621010.baseFlair_: My wings' true form lies somewhere in the middle. I am a saintly maiden—yet so too am I a maiden of darkness.
108621010.evoFlair_: "A pact of white, and pact of ebon. In this moment destiny is mine to select!" "Mrrrow now, what are you getting yourself into?"

110621020.baseEffect_:
Strike: Deal 1 damage to your leader.

110621020.baseFlair_: Go forth and convulse en masse, for love is but an illusion, a ravenous phantom that endlessly devours reason. Cast down this adoration, discrimination, and division.
110621020.evoFlair_:
The Second Provision: Love Not
Inamorato, inamorata—the greater the affection, the greater the hindrance to our cause. Know your fellows not as lovers but as partners. —Teachings from the Manor of Lust

115621030.baseFlair_: My first battle was waged in vengeance against the goblins. Next, I plunged into the fray as an agent. If never-ending battle is my lot, then let my blade be the bane of a thousand fiends!

115621030.evoFlair_:
Teena: I'm worried about Lucius. He's always throwing himself into dangerous situations...

Feena: Yeah, I really wish he'd settle down a bit.

123621010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard 2 cards. Draw a card. At the start of your next turn, draw a card.
123621010.baseFlair_: This is kind of embarrassing, but my thirst is insatiable. One drop or mouthful isn't enough. Rosethorn Fangs, drink everything dry! Let the blood nourish my thorns!
123621010.evoFlair_: These thorns are my fangs. They sup on fresh blood, nourishing me. Ah, my roses are looking a little withered—but I don't want to share. This sweet nectar is mine, all mine!

103614010.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower Rush.
Enhance (4): Then give it +2/+2.
103614010.baseFlair_: Oh! This axe is delighted to finally taste blood!

120614010.baseEffect_: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 2 times. If any evolved allied followers are in play, do this 4 times instead.
120614010.baseFlair_: "Those monsters don't have any weak spots," the hunter said with a grin. "And that's why there's no need for precision."

102624030.baseEffect_: Summon X Forest Bats and deal X damage to your leader. X equals the number of enemy followers in play.
102624030.baseFlair_: When precious blood is offered, creatures of the night spawn from the shadows.

105624010.baseEffect_: Select an allied Neutral follower. Whenever that follower attacks an enemy follower, destroy the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return until the end of the turn.

108624010.baseEffect_: Give an allied follower +1/+0 until the end of the turn. Summon a Forest Bat if it's a Bloodcraft follower.
108624010.baseFlair_: Your blood's not worth a suck.

111624010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Restore 1 defense to both leaders.
111624010.baseFlair_: Close your eyes, and plant your seeds in the sea of compassion.

114624010.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the nightwalker discovered her kindness in his manor, he saw a mad, ardent aether. He soon learned that it grants power to those who easily succumb to insanity.

118624010.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower that costs 3 play points or less.
118624010.baseFlair_:
You're going to die anyway—you may as well amuse me.

713624020.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower that costs 3 play points or less.
713624020.baseFlair_:
Everything for my Katalina.
—Vira, Knight Fanatic

Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Draw a card.

115634010.baseFlair_: If that vampire poses even the slightest threat to the people, the danger cannot be ignored. What bothers me is that uncanny. Power. What is... Ah. It brings. Understanding. Of madness. —Vampire hunter's scrawled journal entry

117634010.baseEffect_:
Summon a Forest Bat.
If Wrath is active for you, evolve it and draw 1 card. Otherwise, deal 1 damage to your leader.
117634010.baseFlair_: An evil sound wave that bites faster than fangs ever could.

121634010.baseFlair_: The robots can continue functioning thanks to the remnants their creator left behind. Combined with the ancient technology of Naterra, they can live without fear of destruction. "A miscalculation, but a happy one. Farewell, sister." —Tales from Naterra, Entry 11

900644030.baseFlair_:
Profit.
Profit breeds extravagance.
It is an aggregation of vanity and nonsense.
If meaningless profit is our reality, splurge it all away.

900644040.baseFlair_:
Your blood shall sate my thirst.

900644060.baseEffect_:

If any allied Urias, Final Vampires are in play, deal 1 damage to your leader and recover 1 evolution point.
900644060.baseFlair_: The vampire wishes for eternal revelry. He does not fear being felled by a foe; what terrifies him is that the curtains will eventually fall and the time for dancing will end.

Give your leader the following effect: During your turn, whenever an enemy follower is destroyed, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
If any allied Urias, Final Vampires are in play, deal 1 damage to your leader and 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
900644070.baseFlair_: The vampire dances around his foe, trying to identify a weakness. Nothing stirs the heart of the leading man more than those rare occasions a skilled, challenging partner takes to the stage.

900644080.baseEffect_:

If any allied Urias, Final Vampires are in play, deal 1 damage to your leader and all enemy followers.
900644080.baseFlair_: The vampire turns his back on the unruly audience. There is no antagonist or supporting player who can outshine him, and so he must dance alone.

121613010.baseFlair_: In lieu of a vampiric brand, he bestows upon her a crimson parting gift of another kind. The flower, and the lone screw, are a reminder of the glorious dance they shared. —Tales from Naterra, Entry 13

122613010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.

122613010.baseFlair_: To the gentlefolk of high vampiric society, a good necklace is like a good platter—a complement to the main dish.

101623010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (4)
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to both leaders.
101623010.baseFlair_: The roses of the underworld are dyed with fresh blood.

100611010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+0 if Vengeance is active for you.
100611010.baseFlair_: You poor thing. It must be terrible to be haunted by your fears even in your dreams. I know! I can feast on those pesky dreams while you sleep!
100611010.evoFlair_: How dreadfully delightful—consumed by the horrors of your own dreamscape. Why don't you let me devour your delicious nightmares? I won't leave anything behind, but at least you won't suffer anymore.

100611020.baseFlair_: What shall I have for dinner tonight? I think it's going to have to be a human. A real live human. That's the only thing that'll satisfy my hunger. Hee-hee!
100611020.evoFlair_: Nothing tastes better than a human! So full of light! So full of life! All the emotions like love and desire! It's all so delicious!

101611010.baseEffect_: Strike: Deal 1 damage to both leaders.
101611010.baseFlair_: Don't you just look like a bundle of fun. How about you and me skip right to the chase, hmm? Oh, and we don't need to go telling anybody what fun we got up to, do we now?
101611010.evoFlair_: I can think of all kinds of ways to keep myself busy with you. Now close those pretty little eyes of yours and don't... move... a muscle...

101611020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Bane if Vengeance is active for you.
101611020.baseFlair_: Venomous blood gushes forth from the wounded scales. If the serpent is to be defeated, it must be done in a single blow.
101611020.evoFlair_: The serpent's blood burns through flesh, bone, and iron alike. The beast must be eradicated, else a painful death awaits.

101611030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card if Vengeance is active for you.
101611030.baseFlair_: People are quick to curse me as a demon of rain, but we both know that rain can be a blessing.
101611030.evoFlair_: It's downpour after downpour. I'm starting to get the sniffles myself. Say, would you be willing to part with some of the spark in that soul of yours?

101611050.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
101611050.baseFlair_: Some friendly advice. Do not make the mistake of thinking a blood wolf civil; approach one too closely and you're likely to walk away a limb or two fewer.
101611050.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101611050.evoFlair_: Blood wolves are implacable hunters. Once they catch the scent of their prey, they will pursue it to the ends of the earth. And until they have eaten their fill of blood and meat, nothing can stop their rampage.

102611010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 and Drain if an evolved allied follower is in play.
102611010.baseFlair_: Hey, that looks like fun. Lemme in on it!
102611010.evoFlair_: Your lives are my toys! Who should I play with next?

102611040.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
102611040.baseFlair_: Snakey's a wild one. You don't want to mess with her.
102611040.evoFlair_: Snakey's a wild one. Don't let her put the squeeze on you!

103611030.baseEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
103611030.baseFlair_: Though I'm a member of the order of the Sky Knights, I'm hardly skilled with a sword. Think of me as a scholar with a propensity for research.
103611030.evoFlair_: If I complete this research, I'll gain power beyond all human knowledge. And then I'll finally be able to complete my mission. Which mission, you ask? Well, to save as many people as possible of course!

104611020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
104611020.baseFlair_: Stately strands of alabaster protect my home. Anything that gets entangled in it is my foe and my prey.
104611020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104611020.evoFlair_: The strands of my web decide where you go. But should I suffocate you or suck you dry? The choice is mine.

105611030.baseEffect_: When another allied Neutral follower comes into play, this follower gains Rush.
105611030.baseFlair_: So slithy their forms! May they waltz and gimble and gambol! May their voices sound! —Poems of Unbeing
105611030.evoFlair_: Innocent as babes they pitter-patter, peculiar in shape but dearworth. —Poems of Unbeing

106611030.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Strike: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
106611030.baseFlair_: Hunting is the rite of receiving the blessings of the land. Respect the land and act with humility. Otherwise you will find yourself becoming the hunted. —Orion's Scorpion, Chapter 5
106611030.evoFlair_: Even great heroes who have felled many beasts are no match for its poison. Victims suffer from paralysis, dizziness, nausea, and severe headaches. These migraines then turn into a sleep from which the victim will never awaken. —Orion's Scorpion, Chapter 8

107611010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain +3/+3. Deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you. Restore 2 defense to your leader if Vengeance is active for you.
107611010.baseFlair_: Looks like you need some help! Wait, w-what do you mean, you don't need me? I guess I... I really am useless, after all!
107611010.evoFlair_: Perhaps I can be of assistance? Allow me to help! Wait, I m-made it on time? No way... Uh, I'll do my best!

107611030.baseFlair_: "I'm telling y'all, it really moved! See? Here's where it bit me, right here!" — Rural Man
107611030.evoFlair_: "See? That's what I've been telling y'all this whole time! Now look what it's gone and done. Everything's been taken!" — Rural Man

109611010.baseFlair_: "These men are too easy. Isn't there something that can entertain me?" "Perhaps we could dance, milady?" "Why would I dance with a bat?"
109611010.evoFlair_: "What's the point? Everyone falls for me anyway. There's no fun in that." "How about a song then, milady?" "Isn't that just screeching?"

110611020.baseEffect_: Once on each of your turns, when your leader takes damage, gain +1/+0.
110611020.baseFlair_: You think it's cute, eh? Well what kind of adorable little varmint could live 'round these parts? Gotta be more to it than just squeezable cheeks. —Wasteland Explorer
110611020.evoFlair_:
Some beasties try to broadcast how dangerous they are, but, more often than not, it's just a performance. Not the case with this little guy.
—Wasteland Explorer

110611030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Leader Strike: Restore 2 defense to both leaders after damage is dealt.
110611030.baseFlair_: Whether demonic, divine, or mundane breed, go forth and convulse en masse. It is in the confluence of our differences that we grow stronger. Cast down this odium, discrimination, and division.

110611030.evoFlair_:
The First Provision: Loathe Not
Consecrate your character, your very being, to this, the greatest cause. Look upon your fellows not as abominations but as partners.
—Teachings from the Manor of Lust

111611040.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4. If Vengeance is active for you, gain +5/+5 instead.
111611040.baseFlair_: I strayed from the path. It was no accident. Every step was intentional. With this arm, no one will ever trample me again.
111611040.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111611040.evoFlair_: I strayed from the path. Don't misunderstand—it was long before I made my pact with a demon. The wretched girl who once drank from backstreet mud puddles is gone. In her place stands a woman with power. Now I am the one to trample others underfoot!

112611010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3. Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader and restore 4 defense to your leader.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 2 defense to your leader.
112611010.baseFlair_: I'm a failure of a pup. My ears are bad, and I can't smell very good either. But, but I can perform! I learned how to do acrobatics and jump through a flaming ring! If I can make you smile, well, that's enough for me!
112611010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112611010.evoFlair_: You poor, sorrowful pup. I remember when you appeared before me, evidence of my sin... I have no right to be in your life. —Lunelle, Queen of Wolves

113611010.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Serpent comes into play, change it into a Machina follower.
113611010.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. Armored Bats synthesized with machinery soon appeared... Just as those who would control such beasts did afterward. —Secrets of Sorcery Demystified I
113611010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon 2 Serpents.
Whenever an allied Serpent comes into play, change it into a Machina follower.
113611010.evoFlair_: Bats... Whoooa... So cool... But... I'm happy... Together... With my snakes, too... After all, they're everything... to me. —Gearsnake Tamer to Armored Bat

113611030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is not active for you, deal 2 damage to your leader. If Vengeance is active for you, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
113611030.baseFlair_: Abnormal figures take form in the shadows. They mimic the living, taking form through negative emotion. Even now, they lay hidden within the gaps.
113611030.evoFlair_: Some evils simply cannot die. As the demons we carry within ourselves take form once more, malice and despair writhe and wriggle into existence.

114611010.baseFlair_: Use my arrows to necrotize your enemies' bodies and bring them under my control? Understood. About your plan though. I think there's room for optimization. I'm willing to offer you a one-time-only discount. Just take a look at this updated contract...
114611010.evoFlair_: So you want me to use my magic to sow discord in the enemy camp? Understood. If you'll just sign here—that's right, in blood—we can get this contract squared away. Great. Now if you're ready, I'd like to take you through a few alternate plans...

114611030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If Vengeance is active for you, gain +1/+0 and Ward.
114611030.baseFlair_:
I've never seen that species before. Its wings generate some sort of light. What could that be? I have to... follow. It. This is. A great. Discovery. But. Those wings. I feel like. They are. Madness. Given form...
—Scholar's scrawled journal entry
114611030.evoFlair_:
Strange. Strange. Strange. Strange. Strange, strange bat. How odd. Why? Does my head. Feel so... strange? Wings? Strange? The madness. Won't stop.
—Twisted scrawl

115611010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Summon a Forest Bat.
115611010.baseFlair_: The manual says no great succubus's career was built in a day. So you gotta listen to your elders and put in the elbow grease! Mmmwah! How was that, Mr. Bat? Charming enough for ya?
115611010.evoFlair_: Look at all those demons coming this way... Did my hard work finally pay off? I'm improving! Wait... they're all here to meet her, aren't they? I knew it...

115611020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Wrath is not active for you, gain the following effect - At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader and this follower. Otherwise, gain the following effect - At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
115611020.baseFlair_: The horned beast's meat is tough. Its flavor unfolds as you chew. You must kill it the same way. Blow after blow after blow, until it falls. —Second Berserker's Epitaph: Part 1
115611020.evoFlair_: I took my first pelt. My history is written on its skin. I will gain the beast's resilience. I will don the pelt and test my strength. —Second Berserker's Epitaph: Part 2

116611010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, draw a card.
116611010.baseFlair_: You're looking for a contract... with me? Oh darling, do you know what you're getting yourself into? It'll sting. And you understand everything comes with a price tag, don't you? Hm? I'm too straitlaced to be a vampire, you say? Hah. You really think so?
116611010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116611010.evoFlair_: Look, honey—I despise lies. I've been that way since I was mortal. Anyway, we are talking binding contracts here. These things are much nicer when both parties are interested. Now, be a dear and give me some blood. But... do tell me if it hurts.

117611010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Avarice is active for you, gain +0/+2 and Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain +3/+3.
117611010.baseFlair_: I'm The Moon, howler of apprehension. I stand ready to defend the frightened. I'm still learning as a pup, but I eat cowardice for breakfast.
117611010.evoFlair_: With a little practice, I can crush any fears. I might be young, but I'm not afraid to howl in the moonlight. We're picky about our masters—but if you're worthy, werewolves become the perfect bodyguards.

118611010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If Wrath is not active for you, deal 1 damage to your leader. Otherwise, gain +1/+1 and Storm.
118611010.baseFlair_: My supersonic attacks can rend darkness itself—but this is just child's play. You sure you don't need to stop me? To be fair, I guess you can't—you'd actually have to catch me first!
118611010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118611010.evoFlair_: My supersonic attacks are now at full throttle! Couldn't stop me after all, huh? Not that I expected you to. If you had a hard time seeing me before, I'm practically invisible now!

119611030.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Summon 3 Wicked Wolves. Give all allied Wicked Wolves the following effect: Reduce damage from effects to 0.
119611030.baseFlair_: It is said that they came from a barren wilderness in a distant land. Having hunted all the prey it could find there, the wolf pack was forced to find new grounds to prowl.
119611030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119611030.evoFlair_: The wolf developed an appetite for magical creatures. It consumed their flesh, and with their power running through its veins, it changed. It was reborn as something new, something stronger. Something far more deadly.

121611010.baseFlair_: My, you should see the look on your face. Do my darkened wings fascinate you? They're what you get when you trade a diet of pure morning dew for a feast of blood. But there's no need to pity me—I chose the path I did to become stronger, after all.
121611010.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Summon a Fairy. Give it Bane and change it into a Bloodcraft follower.
121611010.evoFlair_: Every now and then a young fairy comes to me for help. Ah, they remind me of the old me. All I do is give their pristine wings a little nudge in the right direction. Once they develop a taste for blood, they never go back.

122611020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, gain +2/+2 and destroy an enemy follower.
122611020.baseFlair_: It's nothing personal. Should I neglect my training for even a day, my blade would—Oh? Not falling for it? Look, I'm a murderer, not an actor! Let's skip to the fun part!
122611020.evoFlair_: My motives?! Pshhh hahaha! I wanna see blood! Gore! Guts! I kill for the fun of it. Anyone who tries to dress murder up with noble excuses is lying, pal!

123611010.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Strike: If Wrath is active for you, gain +2/+2. Otherwise, deal 1 damage to your leader.
123611010.baseFlair_: Go forth and convulse en masse. From the intermingling of love and loathing comes unity. Be ruled by the provisions, and let lust run rampant.
123611010.evoFlair_: The Ten Omens were bestowed upon the world on a tablet of sapphire stone. Upon the trials' completion, the stone crumbled, but devoted disciples of lust left their manor, to share the teachings with strangers.

900611030.baseFlair_:
Diligent, effective, efficient.

121621010.baseFlair_: Bwahahaha! Sucks to be you, reapers—you're way too late! You think you can just saunter up with your dull blades and collect a soul after its host has died? Psh, anyone with any sense knows that the best souls are ones you harvest fresh.
121621010.evoFlair_: Just as flesh rots and bones turn to dust, souls have a freshness factor. They're like fruits; you've got to pluck them the instant they ripen. Well, it's been nice talking to you, but I've got some souls to devour. Why don't you sharpen your scythe and try again, reaper?

715621010.baseFlair_: Bwahahaha! Sucks to be you, reapers—you're way too late! You think you can just waltz over with your dull blades and collect a soul in your own sweet time? You're gonna have to do better than that if you want to keep up with us!
