If Vengeance is not active for you, deal X damage to your leader. X equals the destroyed follower's attack. Otherwise, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
116624010.baseFlair_: As his vision goes red, he realizes his folly. He asked the devil for strength; he did not ask for life.

120624010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
If Vengeance is active for you, put a Dark General into your hand and change its cost to 1.
120624010.baseFlair_: It is not her spear that will pierce you, but the conviction of her rage.

121624010.baseEffect_:
Select an allied follower and then an enemy follower.
Give +1/+0 to the first follower.
Deal X damage to the second. X equals the first follower's attack.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
121624010.baseFlair_:
"Why hello, my dear Forest Princess! Is today the promised day?" "It is indeed! I've long looked forward to this!" "Then let's talk—for the night is young, and we've much to share!"
—Tales from Naterra, Entry 12

123624010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower and draw a card.
Then, if allied followers have evolved at least 5 times this match, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
123624010.baseFlair_:
"My, you're a bold one. But your brazenness has no place here." —Yuzuki, Righteous Demon
"There's no need to let shame hold you back. Intermingle, and let instinct reign." —Valnareik, Omen of Lust

116634010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as a Urias's Revelry or Mono's Resolve.
If Vengeance is active for you, instead deal 3 damage to the enemy leader and recover 1 evolution point.
116634010.baseFlair_: The world of machines falls to ruin. The cogs that built the nation begin to leak tears. A bemused tongue speaks. "Now show me. Prove that you have a will; prove that you have a soul."

122634010.baseEffect_:
Draw 2 cards.
If Vengeance is not active for you, deal 1 damage to your leader.
If Wrath is not active for you, deal 1 damage to your leader.
122634010.baseFlair_:
When the day comes, I'll take it for myself with these very hands.
—Luca Yonazuki

900644010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Restore 2 defense to your leader.
900644010.baseFlair_: A richer rouge for a ruby red rose.

115613010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the start of your opponent's turn, give Bane to a random allied Bloodcraft follower. Then, if your leader took damage during your previous turn, give it +1/+1.
115613010.baseFlair_:
We lived by hunting beasts and eating their flesh. Once we knew the power of their pelts, we hunters became warriors.
—First Berserker's Epitaph

104623010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (5)
Whenever your leader takes damage, reduce the damage to 0 and subtract the same amount from this amulet's Countdown instead. (If there is more than 1 allied Mask of the Black Death in play, subtract this amount from the Countdown of each.)
104623010.baseFlair_: Like any other contagion, death can be prevented.

900623010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your opponent's turn, summon a Forest Bat.
900623010.baseFlair_: It lurks under the shadow of night—the embodiment of darkness, perhaps the manifestation of night itself. Watch your step, for the night is unforgiving.

900623020.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to your leader.
Last Words: Restore 8 defense to your leader.
900623020.baseFlair_: It lurks under the shadow of night—an invisible presence as shapeless as the dark, perhaps the manifestation of night itself. Make the wrong move, and the night shall punish.

900623030.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Draw 2 cards.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
900623030.baseFlair_: The way of blue is the way of riches. Be wary not to sit in the lap of luxury for too long. —Alexandrite Demon

102632020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, summon a Forest Bat if an allied Forest Bat is in play. Then if there were 4 cards in your area when the turn ended, destroy this amulet and deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals the number of allied Forest Bats in play.
102632020.baseFlair_: An ancient fortress of the darkest black surrounded by countless creatures of the night. Occasionally, screams can be heard through the din of flapping wings.

100611030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
100611030.baseFlair_: More, I tell you! More! Heads will roll until my axe turns blunt, and then I'll chop some more!
100611030.evoFlair_: You're out of people to execute? You filthy liar! All humans will answer for the crime of existing, and I will be their judge, jury, and executioner!

101611060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 and Ward if Vengeance is active for you.
101611060.baseFlair_: If you ever find yourself exploring a dungeon, beware of metal statues. They're ice-hearted guardians who will show you no mercy.
101611060.evoFlair_: Their glazed look has fooled many a dungeon raider into dismissing them as harmless. Never ever turn your back on one.

101611070.baseFlair_: Roll up, roll up! Get ya front-row seat to the slaughterhouse show of a lifetime, hosted by this pint-sized imp 'erself! Mind ya, don't lean in too close, though. Lethal accidents do happen on occasion! Hee-hee.
101611070.evoFlair_: What better night for a slaughter than one lit by a blood-drenched full moon! I promise you'll love it to death. 'Ang on a minute. Didn't I just kill you? Hey, get back 'ere!

101611110.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Drain if Vengeance is active for you.
101611110.baseFlair_: My demon claw yearns for blood, so I'll have to take your life. It's nothing personal.
101611110.evoFlair_: Do you see? It throbs with hunger! Please, let it sink into your desperate face! Let it steep its fingers in the warmth of your lifeblood.

101611130.baseFlair_: Yes, yes! More! Oh, is that all you have? But I was so enjoying myself. If that's all the fun you can offer, I'll just have to kill you.
101611130.evoFlair_: That's more like it! I think it's time to kick this up a notch, don't you agree? Don't go dying too quickly, you hear? Ah-ha-ha!

101611140.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader if their defense is higher than yours.
101611140.baseFlair_: It's no use trying to hide it. I can see it all over your face—you're dreaming of us together in paradise. Tee-hee. I do like the shy ones.
101611140.evoFlair_: Hmm, you are a shy one. Don't worry, I won't bite—much. Tee-hee, we'll do things you only dreamed of. And some you didn't.

102611020.baseEffect_: Whenever another follower evolves, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 1 defense to your leader.
102611020.baseFlair_: They're all bright and pretty like people souls...
102611020.evoFlair_: Now I'm strong and sparkly too. Hurray...

103611050.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Summon an Alpha Wolfman if Vengeance is active for you.
103611050.baseFlair_: The woods around here belong to wolfmen. If you see bite marks or scratches on the trees, turn back. There's no reasoning with a beast once you're inside its territory.
103611050.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
103611050.evoFlair_: Wolfmen can use their impressive claws to take down monsters many times larger than themselves. If you ever come across monster carcasses with their throats ripped out, that's the work of wolfmen.

104611040.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain +1/+0.
104611040.baseFlair_: I wanted to fly from the time I was a tadpole, and the gods eventually gave me these wings. I'm happy about that, but I lost the most beloved thing in my life. I no longer have a purpose or reason to live. What am I supposed to do now?
104611040.evoFlair_: Eureka! At last! An answer! I don't need a purpose or reason to live, because I'm as free as the sky itself. There's nothing I can't do.

105611010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Ward if an enemy follower is in play. Gain +2/+0 and deal 2 damage to your leader if no enemy followers are in play.
105611010.baseFlair_: Humph! It's not like I care about you!
105611010.evoFlair_: Humph! Don't—don't get any ideas! I'm not going to help you fight your stupid enemies!

106611020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
106611020.baseFlair_: We've got a rule on this mountain, one that might contradict what you know: don't fight against the bite. —Prospector's teachings
106611020.evoFlair_: If you run into that thing, you better start praying. But none of that "save me" crap. No, you'll wanna pray that it kills you quickly in a single bite. —Prospector's teachings

107611020.baseFlair_: If you were able to tame a magical wolf, it would bite the hands of your foes; there's no better friend to have on the battlefield. —"Wolves," The Monster Encyclopedia, Chapter 4
107611020.evoFlair_: If you know what they want and are able to provide it for them, magical wolves can be fiercely loyal hunters for their partners. —"Wolves," The Monster Encyclopedia, Chapter 5

108611010.baseEffect_: Fanfare and Last Words: Summon a Forest Bat.
108611010.baseFlair_: She'll guide you to a dream, a wonderful dream from which you'll never wake up.
108611010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108611010.evoFlair_: None can escape from the dream. None can run from it. Now let me color you something altogether new.

109611020.baseFlair_: An ancient curse afflicts me... It causes magic to pour ceaselessly from my body. Monsters are attracted to this residual power—that's why I can't risk traveling with others.
109611020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower if Vengeance is not active for you. Deal 1 damage to all enemies if Vengeance is active for you.
109611020.evoFlair_:
Guh... Gaargh!
The power's running wild... I can't control it! If you don't want to get caught in the blast, get away from me! Now!

111611010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +2/+0 to a Bloodcraft follower in your hand.
111611010.baseFlair_:
A deceitful stag demon, wreathed in smoke wherever it goes. If you would hear the truth from its lips, you must bind it within a magic triangle.
—Chapter 1, Evil Beasts and How to Bind Them
111611010.evoFlair_:
A deceitful stag demon wreathed in flame. Bringer of tempests. Its rasping voice imparts the world's deepest mysteries.
—Chapter 2, Evil Beasts and How to Bind Them

112611030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +4/+4 and Ward.
Last Words: Summon 2 Assembly Droids.
112611030.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was a diminutive nightkin. Its body—well, frame—is as cute as it is curious. But I see that its new form has retained its mischievous love of biting. —Vampire Hunter's Notes, Part 1
112611030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112611030.evoFlair_: I daresay, I witnessed the most inexplicable phenomenon last night: a colony of bats donning steel. Was this a mere trick of my mortal brethren? Or have I glimpsed into the future of their species? —Vampire's Account, Part 1

113611020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
113611020.baseFlair_:
The wordwielder who eradicated love. The demon who returned to her side. The reason he left the town was to find the strength to resist the curse. With the power of truth, he showed her the meaning of love.
—Ville de l'Amour, Reunited
113611020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113611020.evoFlair_:
"There are no falsehoods in my words: I love you."
"I...I l-love you too."
This is Ville de l'Amour. A town brimming with the miracle known as love.
—Ville de l'Amour, A Union

114611020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Avarice is active for you, deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +3/+3.
114611020.baseFlair_:
Dearest Mama,
It seems like as soon as we arrive on the scene, my senior officer's face contorts into the most fearsome expressions. He says he's simply motivated, but he frightens me more than the enemy. —Letter from a hellish battlefield
114611020.evoFlair_:
Dearest Mama,
My senior officer said that what was motivating him was the desire to bring everyone back alive. Thanks to him, we're all on our way home.
—Letter from a joyfully victorious city

120611010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: If any evolved allied followers are in play, gain +1/+1.
120611010.baseFlair_: Leave your common sense along with the daylight—the night has its own rules of engagement. The beasts we face are immortal. But so are we, as long as we have comrades who share our ideals.
120611010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120611010.evoFlair_: Cast aside your life along with the daylight—death is the only truth of the night. We have no tomorrow. But neither do they, as long as we complete our mission.

715611010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: If any evolved allied followers are in play, gain +1/+1.
715611010.baseFlair_: What makes sense in the light of day won't help you once the sun sets—the night has its own rules of engagement. The fiends we face are immortal, but so are we, as long as we have each other.
715611010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
715611010.evoFlair_: Life as you know it ends at dusk—death is the only truth of the night. There is no promise of tomorrow for us, but the same goes for them. Unlike them, however, we will be victorious.

120611030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have at least 20 cards with different names in your deck, gain +1/+1 and the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
120611030.baseFlair_: Its oversized hatchet is honed to part the head of even the largest demon from its shoulders. Its hood allows it to see even creatures without form. Behold the netherworld's executioner. Those who flout the laws of demonkind meet their gory end at its blade.
120611030.evoEffect_: Evolve: If you have at least 20 cards with different names in your deck, gain +2/+2 and Ward.
120611030.evoFlair_: Its many grotesque arms rend demons from limb to limb. Its unsealed eye slays even immortal creatures. Behold the netherworld's executioner. Those who violate the laws of demonkind will vanish forever into the mist-shrouded valleys of the otherworld.

121611020.baseEffect_:
Drain.
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, gain +2/+2 and Rush.
121611020.baseFlair_: Don't think. Just do it. Don't think. Just let yourself feel. Forget. Forget it all. Don't try to remember. Focus on how good it feels to tear into flesh. All I need is to devote myself to bloodlust. I don't need anything else.
121611020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
121611020.evoFlair_: The travelers screamed in defiance, and then in despair, as they were slaughtered. They asked him who in their right mind would do something so utterly cruel. But of course, the devil didn't think—didn't dare to think—as it ripped the last screams from its prey.

122611010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Demon. If Avarice is active for you, give it Bane.
122611010.baseFlair_: Hah! Don't be absurd. Demons aren't scary, they're tools. Show 'em who's boss!
122611010.evoFlair_: You've gotta have confidence. Poise! Give those greedy brutes an inch, and they'll try to take a mile. Show 'em you're greedier!

101621010.baseEffect_: Can only attack if Vengeance is active for you.
101621010.baseFlair_: Loyalty... Justice... I used to believe in such things, but I was a naive fool. Such lofty concepts are nothing but a hindrance on the battlefield.
101621010.evoFlair_: See? I once pledged undying loyalty to my king, yet now I have the strength to fell him with one blow! Ha-ha-ha-ha!

101621030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to allied Forest Bats.
101621030.baseFlair_: I'm sooo tired of being stuck inside! And what's wrong with having a little fun on a night like this when the moon's so beautiful? Come on, my little friend, you can join in as well!
101621030.evoFlair_: Oh no, the sun's come out! Looks like the fun's over then. Come on, let's get back to the mansion. You'll escort me, right, my little friend?

101621080.baseFlair_: Hrrr! I'm not like you dumb humans, you know. Not with this new power. I'm strong now. Stronger than vampires! Stronger than a lykos!
101621080.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to both leaders.
101621080.evoFlair_: Hrrr... Wh-what? My mind! I-it's melting... melting away... My mind is blank... and it feels good! Hrrr, hrrr! It feels goood!

101621090.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers if Vengeance is active for you.
101621090.baseFlair_: I am the unknown assassin. I serve the Vampire Lord, striking soundlessly from the shadowing and claiming the lives of hapless humans.
101621090.evoFlair_: A slash of my claws and a life is claimed. And then another. So long as the Vampire Lord wills it, the masked assassin shall continue to hunt.

103621020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Clash: Summon a Forest Bat.
103621020.baseFlair_: I have been sent to greet you in place of our sleeping empress. When you meet her, you better show enough respect to make her feel like you're kissing her feet.
103621020.evoFlair_: You humans are our food. The only reason I haven't consumed you is as a favor to the queen. But you know, I think I could use a little snack. Don't worry! I'll make sure it doesn't hurt... much.

107621010.baseFlair_: Oh, you're a new face. I'll pierce you right there—it will only hurt for an instant... but you'll be begging for more when I'm done with you.
107621010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy an allied follower, then summon a copy of that follower and give it Rush.
107621010.evoFlair_: I'll give you some love. It will only hurt for a second, but the pleasure will be worth your while—I promise.

107621020.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers if Vengeance is active for you.
107621020.baseFlair_: This amalgamation of beasts tears into flesh of its prey with the fangs of a lion—only after it has succumbed to the toxins of the scorpion tail, of course.
107621020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107621020.evoFlair_: It's easy to forget about the serpent, but one should never ignore it—the venomous clouds expelled from its fangs are fatal.

114621020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain Bane.
114621020.baseFlair_:
That person who dealt with us all so honestly, never forgetting why we were here... The one who took such pains to look after. Us. Is that... his. True. Nature? Or. Was. A. Good. Man. Twisted. By. Madness?
—Adventurer's scrawled journal entry
114621020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114621020.evoFlair_:
His t-t-t-truuuue. TRUE nature. Is. A. Werewolf.
Change. What will? The journey. Forgotten?
Creeping, creeping. Madness gobbles you up. Chomp, chomp.
—Twisted scrawl

115621010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, summon 2 Cougar Pelt Warriors.
115621010.baseFlair_: The long-clawed beast's flesh spoils quickly. Leave it a single night and it becomes inedible. Devour it as though pursuing a beast in flight, however, and the meat will melt on your tongue. —Third Berserker's Epitaph: Part 1
115621010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115621010.evoFlair_: The horned beast's hide can resist those claws. The long-clawed beast's pelt grants speed. Our next hunt's target is set. —Third Berserker's Epitaph: Part 2

117621010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card. If Vengeance is not active for you, deal 2 damage to your leader. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
117621010.baseFlair_: I am The Devil, master of mayhem. Greed? Impulse? Tyranny requires no justification to exist. Cede to pain. Thrust it upon others, and seize all that you covet.
117621010.evoFlair_: I am a calamity that rages as my desires dictate. My underlings? All prisoners of war. These wings? My plunder. Pain sustains me, and I shall teach its virtue to the uninitiated.

118621020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put an Executioner's Axe into your hand.
Once on each of your turns, when this follower gains Rush or Ward, gain +2/+2.
118621020.baseFlair_: They know that fashion is about novelty. That's why their caps are frequently dyed—and only the freshest blood will do.
118621020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118621020.evoFlair_: They know that fashion is about hype. That's why they share dyeing tips—and information on where to extract the brightest red.

119621010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Strike: Gain +1/+0.
Can't be attacked.
119621010.baseFlair_: Look at this beautiful, lovely masterpiece! Crazy to the max, isn't it? I call it my Divine Death Saw of Death! Wh-what? You think it's cool, too? Hmm... You've got good taste! I like you!
119621010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119621010.evoFlair_: Hehe... Hahaha... All I want's peace of mind and serenity. Soooo, if you're here to hurt my friends, you're going to go sayonara-bye-bye!

122621030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: At the start of your next turn, draw a card.
122621030.baseFlair_:
Hnyahahaha! Too slow!
Hmm? Are you reeeally sure you wanna know why I butted in on your battle?
Curiosity kills!
122621030.evoFlair_: We're curious to a fault! Once we get going, there's no stopping us. Man, I just get this tingly feeling in my claws, and before I know—oh. Oopsie! Hnyahaha!

101631020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an allied follower Storm if Vengeance is active for you.
101631020.baseFlair_: Stop dawdling and finish the job already! I expect victory to be all but assured before I step even one foot upon the battlefield, or have you forgotten? Now pulverize them this instant!
101631020.evoFlair_: The thick stench of charred flesh in the air, ash raining down across a backdrop of jet-black skies. Yes, a veritable feast for the senses. I may have found my paradise yet.

107631010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever your leader takes damage during your turn, recover 1 play point. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
107631010.baseFlair_: Long time no see... Or was it? Hee-hee. Anyway, I bought a new outfit, what do you think? Don't you wanna go on a date? It's gonna be our little secret, okay?
107631010.evoFlair_: Come on now, don't be shy. After all, we've already done so much together... What, you don't remember? In that case, I'll just have to show you again.

109631030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (9) - If your leader has 19 defense or less, this follower's attack and defense become X. X equals 20 minus your leader's defense.
109631030.baseFlair_: At the gates of Mashu stands a sentinel—half man, half creature. Seeking fresh offerings for Shamash, it conceals his tail from travelers.
109631030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Gain Storm if your leader has 2 defense or less.
109631030.evoFlair_: The verses depict tales of a monster who stands at the divide between the heavens and earth. Despite its sinister appearance, it has more in common with the divine than a monster.

115631010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to both leaders. If Avarice is active for you, repeat once.
Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
115631010.baseFlair_: The mountainous beast's flesh was not fit for consumption. But three days later, its odor had become more appetizing, and when I tried it, I found the flavor had greatly improved. —Fifth Berserker's Epitaph: Part 1
115631010.evoEffect_: Last Words: Restore 4 defense to your leader.
115631010.evoFlair_: Our longtime enemy was brought down by the tusked beast's charge. Armed with the mountainous beast's raw strength, we set our sights upon the king of the wilderness. —Fifth Berserker's Epitaph: Part 2

116631010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 10 allied Machina followers have been destroyed this match, recover 1 evolution point.
116631010.baseFlair_: The advent of machinery had much to offer us creatures of the night. The most notable gift? A radical form of treatment, which does not extend life but augments it. Perhaps now we can fulfill a long-held dream. Perhaps now we can win back our freedom. —Bloodkin Memoirs
116631010.evoEffect_: Evolve: If there are at least 2 Machina cards in your hand, give your leader the following effect - At the end of your opponent's turn, summon an Assembly Droid. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
116631010.evoFlair_: Once they fused their flesh with metal, the nightwalkers knew. "Technology lifts the limits nature imposed on life, and it can lift the limits fate imposed on our race," they said. "Technology can raze all resistance, and it can lead us to freedom." —Purebloods

116631020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an allied amulet is in play, deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
116631020.baseFlair_:
contagion—spreading from beast. beast—taints life itself. great power. must let someone know. please. spread word quickly. let world know. spread. the madness.
—Scrawled Memo from a Doctor
116631020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - During your turn, whenever cards are added to your hand from your deck, deal 1 damage to a random enemy. Do this X times. X equals the number of cards added to your hand. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
116631020.evoFlair_:
I figured it out—the source of madness. It lies within the unknowable self. There is no running from madness. It does not forgive. It is a rope, snaking up your limbs and binding you. May madness fetter all of existence.
—The Rope of Madness

119631030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Follower Strike: If the enemy follower is evolved, gain the following effect - The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Clash: Draw cards until there are 5 cards in your hand.
119631030.baseFlair_: The name's Ayer. So you're the one who's been searching for me. I heard you helped Sis out of some tight spots... Don't get the wrong idea—I'm only returning the favor. If you run into any trouble, my fists are yours.
119631030.evoFlair_: Just throwing hands is no fun. Seeing what I can do when I'm on the ropes is when I really feel alive. Step back... I'll handle things from here.

108641030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Blood Moon into your hand.
When an allied Blood Moon comes into play, evolve this follower.
108641030.baseFlair_: We were brutalized and driven to the world's end. The light-dwellers hated us. The night-dwellers scorned us. We can't allow them to live any longer!
108641030.evoFlair_: Show your true nature, pack members! When the moon shimmers through the darkness, we'll be freed from the chains of reason! Tonight the world will be ours again!

110641010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, gain +1/+1 and Storm, and destroy an enemy follower.
At the start of your opponent's turn, if your leader took damage during your previous turn, gain +1/+1.
110641010.baseFlair_: Should we not love our fellows? When seeds of compassion are planted in the arid fields of the human psyche, is it not lust that fertilizes them? Indeed, this is the trial I will administer to the world.
110641010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
110641010.evoFlair_: It's difficult to replace the impulses that govern the association of fellows. Short of breath and shorter of logic, all reason disappears. But, in a sense, there's no better opportunity to recover the true self. Indeed, this is the trial I will administer to the world.

113641020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Whenever an enemy follower comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 1 defense to your leader.
113641020.baseFlair_:
Upon tragedy, a new hope is born. Upon betrayal, a new hand takes hold of power. Only through his determination was he able to cut off the bonds that held him back.
"Consorting with allies is but a crutch for the weak—only the powerful reign supreme on their own!"
113641020.evoEffect_:
Whenever an enemy follower comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 1 defense to your leader.
Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, restore 4 defense to this follower.
113641020.evoFlair_:
Regardless of the people's ignorance of truth, I shall continue down this path. An unstoppable rush of power fills my body... Gone is my former powerless self.
"A tragedy is about to begin... I'll take the throne with my very own hands!"

114641030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader and X damage to all enemy followers. X equals this follower's attack.
Last Words: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Put a 3/5 Kudlak into your deck.
114641030.baseFlair_: Let us spread pestilence. Let us trample the harvest underfoot. Your bodies are lesions. Your strength, a disease. If you would resist, prepare yourselves. The human who strikes me down will be reviled throughout the ages for their sins.
114641030.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Put 3 copies of a 3/5 Kudlak into your deck.
114641030.evoFlair_: Let us spread pathology. Let us blight the harvests. Hawthorn stake. White amnion. If you cannot prepare both, you will die. The human who tells me tales of the end will be lauded throughout the ages for their heroism.

900641050.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader and X damage to all enemy followers. X equals this follower's attack.
Last Words: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Put a 3/5 Kudlak into your deck.
900641050.baseFlair_: Let us spread pestilence. Let us trample the harvest underfoot. Your bodies are lesions. Your strength, a disease. If you would resist, prepare yourselves. The human who strikes me down will be reviled throughout the ages for their sins.
900641050.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Put 3 copies of a 3/5 Kudlak into your deck.
900641050.evoFlair_: Let us spread pathology. Let us blight the harvests. Hawthorn stake. White amnion. If you cannot prepare both, you will die. The human who tells me tales of the end will be lauded throughout the ages for their heroism.

115641020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader. Restore 3 defense to your leader.
At the start of your opponent's turn, if your leader took damage during your previous turn, gain +1/+1.
After Clashing with an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, fully restore this follower's defense.
115641020.baseFlair_: Haahahahahaa! Well done, worm! Very impressive, awakening me! As thanks, perhaps I'll grant you the honor of becoming my servant!
115641020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115641020.evoFlair_: Only the queen of the night could ever possess such beauty, such dignity. Kneel at my feet and bask in my presence. You could ask no greater honor than to serve Illya Ornstein!

117641030.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Bloodcraft followers that originally cost 3 play points or less
----------
Fanfare: If this card is fused with at least 3 cards, draw cards until there are 6 cards in your hand. Then, if this card is fused with at least 6 cards, deal 6 damage to all enemy followers.
117641030.baseFlair_:
'Tis not the rain that beats, but her brazen footsteps.
'Tis not the thunder that blasts, but her voice in song.
'Tis not the gales that bluster, but her exuberant sighs.
—Imminent Storm: Stanza 7
117641030.evoFlair_:
Look toward the lady on her throne of clouds.
Weep, for the lady now glowers upon the earth.
Tremble before the lady who strikes down sinners.
—Imminent Storm: Stanza 16

118641020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card. Then, if at least 15 cards have been added to your hand from your deck this match (your starting hand doesn't count), evolve this follower.
118641020.baseFlair_: The other half that I lost is restored. It doesn't change the fact that, in the end, I'm a pitiful demon. If you'll let me stay by your side, though... I'll help you in any way I can!
118641020.evoFlair_: I'm imperfect, but your encouragement kept me going. I might not be worthy of you, even with both my wings. But... if you're okay with it, I'll stand by you until both wings are no more!

121641030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, draw a card.
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, draw a card.
121641030.baseFlair_: The last of the vampires stands, soaked in the blood of countless battles. His thirst undiminished, he wanders in search of the ultimate opponent. He knows no sorrow, no desire, no salvation, for his heart is an eternal battlefield.
121641030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put an A Horrible Night into your hand.
121641030.evoFlair_: If night is the time for dreams, is this reality? It was a whim that brought me out of my castle, but I never imagined I would find such powerful opponents. Travelers of dimensions, denizens of other worlds, and my last dance partner—yes, she was particularly amusing.

122641020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 2 Forest Bats. If you have at least 7 remaining play points, put a Darkfeast Bat into your hand.
Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, give it Rush. Then, if Wrath is active for you, give it Bane and Drain. Otherwise, deal 1 damage to your leader.
122641020.baseFlair_: Baring your teeth at me again? Goodness, I can't tell whether you're bluffing or merely a fool... No matter. Come along, now, my little bat. The golden night calls these primordial fangs.
122641020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
122641020.evoFlair_: You empathize with humans, and eliminate your own kind. I aim to prove the night needs only one apex predator—me. Our objectives may differ, but our means align. I eagerly anticipate the night we've no bloodsuckers left to kill but each other.

123641010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If allied followers have evolved at least 3 times this match, destroy an enemy follower and draw a card. If allied followers have evolved at least 5 times, destroy 2 enemy followers and draw 2 cards instead.
123641010.baseFlair_: Ah, yes, love. The emotion that drives drunken fools to throw themselves in the sea. I suppose getting swept away is nice, but there comes a time when we must all sober up—the same goes for you and your so-called Trial of Lust.
123641010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Summon a Yuzuki, Bloodlord. Give it the following effect and evolve it: At the end of your turn, banish this follower.
123641010.evoFlair_: The moon is the only witness to the clandestine doings between dusk and dawn. Curses flow like lovers' whispers; wounds caress the skin like crimson kisses. In the morning light, lust scatters like blossoms on the wind. "Love is a bubbly drink; delightful, but ephemeral."

101614030.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Deal 6 damage instead if Vengeance is active for you.
101614030.baseFlair_: Blood will be paid for in blood.

106614010.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Put a Serpent into your hand.
106614010.baseFlair_: This poison could kill you four times over with more to spare. —Snake handler

107614010.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to a follower and give it Drain if it's a Bloodcraft follower.
If Vengeance is active for you, recover 2 play points.
107614010.baseFlair_: This time for man has come to an end—let us usher in a new era.

109614010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Recover 1 evolution point.
109614010.baseFlair_: Thirst for eternity, drink for eternity.

112614010.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower. Summon a Serpent.
Enhance (6): Summon 4 Serpents instead.
112614010.baseFlair_: If bitten by the viper, alert those around you and immediately isolate yourself. It's not to save your life; it's to save theirs. The poison dripping from your open wound will soon attract other snakes. —Creatures That Won't Mind If You Die, Serpents and Such

116614010.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Summon a Cursebrand Vampire.
If Vengeance is active for you, give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
116614010.baseFlair_:
May blood and pain blot out the light of the moon.
—Cursebrand Vampire

118614010.baseEffect_:
Select a follower. It can't attack until the start of your next turn.
Summon a Spiderweb Imp. If any allied amulets are in play, give it +2/+0.
118614010.baseFlair_: Once the red threads of fate are tied together, there's no undoing them.

119624010.baseEffect_: Deal 1 damage to all allies and enemies. Do this twice.
119624010.baseFlair_: Common sense and decency are shields wielded by the frail of heart. They are all too easily pierced by the spears of the unscrupulous, who care not for the rules of engagement.

103634010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to your leader. Deal 6 damage to an enemy follower.
Enhance (7): Then summon a Beast Dominator.
103634010.baseFlair_: This thirst simply refuses to be quenched... Won't you give me what I crave?

105634010.baseEffect_:
Select an enemy follower. Whenever the follower attacks, it will deal 3 damage to itself.
If Vengeance is active for you, give this effect to all enemy followers instead.
105634010.baseFlair_: The ghostly white blade sliced through the sickly jet darkness, running through its target like a needle through cloth. —"Night", Poems of Cruelty

106634010.baseEffect_:
Summon 2 Serpents.
Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Venomfang Medusa, Euryale, or Stheno.
106634010.baseFlair_: Our trial is a gift. You should revel in it.

111634010.baseEffect_: Give +2/+0 to all Bloodcraft followers in your hand. Then if Vengeance is active for you, give +2/+0 to all Bloodcraft followers in your deck.
111634010.baseFlair_: Only instinct can break the shackles of reason.

708634010.baseEffect_: Give +2/+0 to all Bloodcraft followers in your hand. Then if Vengeance is active for you, give +2/+0 to all Bloodcraft followers in your deck.
708634010.baseFlair_: Matou blood is pure and respected for its Magecraft. We're even called one of the great Three Founding Families associated with the Holy Grail War if you didn't know.

112634010.baseEffect_:
Put 2 random followers from your deck into your hand.
Summon a Forest Bat for each non-Machina follower added to your hand. Then summon an Assembly Droid for each Machina follower added to your hand.
112634010.baseFlair_: I had a nightmare, so I woke up, and then I went to the window to make sure it wasn't true, but there they were. Just like in my nightmare. —Boy from the fog-filled village

900634010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
If an allied Trill, Devilish Idol is in play, deal 3 damage instead.
900634010.baseFlair_:
"I want your full attention, from the opening bars to the very last note! If you're talking in the back row... I'll find you."
—Trill, Devilish Idol

105613010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (5)
Whenever your leader takes damage during your turn, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, randomly put 1 of the highest-cost followers from your hand into play.
105613010.baseFlair_: Drip, drop, drink, drink, key to the door to carnality! Bones, blood, bodies, breath, come hither unto me! —Bloodlock Manuscript

110613010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (4)
At the end of your turn, if only 1 allied follower is in play, give a random allied follower +1/+1 and Ward.
110613010.baseFlair_: A king of men rules through the favor of his subjects, his path strewn with the petals of his citizens' respect. The king of blood, however, rules through the favor of the night, his path paved with individual ambition.

112622010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, restore 10 defense to your leader, then banish this amulet.
112622010.baseFlair_: An orb of concentrated blood. Those who seek completion find themselves drawn to its luster.

709622010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, restore 10 defense to your leader, then banish this amulet.
709622010.baseFlair_: "I shall descend on the day of Ragnarok!"

113623010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader and draw a card.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader and draw a card.
113623010.baseFlair_:
Using pain as a tool to oppress the people? Utterly preposterous. This is merely a bit of good old-fashioned torture as decreed by the heavens, indeed.
—Heretic Priest

101633010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Deal 6 damage to your leader.
At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader and draw a card.
101633010.baseFlair_: The taste of sin is bittersweet.

104633010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (4)
Fanfare: Activate Vengeance even if your leader's defense is greater than 10. This effect lasts until this amulet leaves play.
104633010.baseFlair_: Thus begins a night of inhumanity.

900643010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (5)
At the end of your turn, restore 1 defense to your leader. If you have more evolution points than your opponent, restore 2 defense instead. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
Last Words: Summon a 4-play point 4/4 XIV. Luzen, Temperance (without Accelerate).
900643010.baseFlair_:
Open your eyes to the nonsense flooding this world.
All one needs is the life pulse of the heart.
Not love, nor anger, nor sorrow. 'Tis all...
Meaningless.

100611050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Storm if Vengeance is active for you.
100611050.baseFlair_: Hear me, allies. Our time has come to retake our place from the vile mortals! May our fury lead us to victory!
100611050.evoFlair_: Allies one and all, the moon drips red for us! Tonight we purge the world of this human scourge and reclaim our blood right!

704611010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Storm if Vengeance is active for you.
704611010.baseFlair_: Hear me, allies. Our time has come to retake our place from the vile mortals! May our fury lead us to victory!
704611010.evoEffect_: (This card will be treated as a Dark General.)
704611010.evoFlair_: Allies one and all, the moon drips red for us! Tonight we purge the world of this human scourge and reclaim our blood right!

101611080.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+0 if Vengeance is active for you.
101611080.baseFlair_: Pain leads to anger; anger leads to power. Nothing is more ferocious than a wounded giant.
101611080.evoFlair_: Pain leads to anger; anger leads to power. A giant, once drunk on blood, is unstoppable.

101611090.baseEffect_: Strike: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
101611090.baseFlair_: I have made a blood oath to fight by your side, and I shall do so until your dying day.
101611090.evoFlair_: I have made a blood oath to fight by your side, and I shall do so until your soul departs this world.

103611040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Recover 1 evolution point if Vengeance is active for you.
103611040.baseFlair_: So this is one of the prism stones. It's beautiful. The warding magic within is sure to keep anyone safe. Would you like to take it with you?
103611040.evoFlair_: I've never given anyone a present before, but I'd like you to have this, hero. I hope you like it. It's something my first friends and I found together: a prism stone.

104611030.baseEffect_: Clash: Gain Bane until the end of the turn if the enemy follower has Ward.
104611030.baseFlair_: "If you value your life, take off your armor." With the werewolf warriors before him, the elderly commander muttered the order. "Those beasts go after the ones who are harder to crush first."
104611030.evoFlair_: "If you value your life, do not resist." The elderly commander curled his lips back as he put his hands up. "If they think you're easy to crush, your life will be spared."

109611030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower, and give a random allied follower +2/+2.
109611030.baseFlair_: Groar... (As an all-powerful demon known across the netherworld, a great offering is required to summon me properly. Otherwise, this is what you receive.)
109611030.evoFlair_: Groargh... (That summoner has run off... I must find them to return to the netherworld. This form is so cumbersome though... I could really use another hand!)

110611010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 2 Serpents.
Enhance (8): Give Bane and Rush to all allied Serpents.
110611010.baseFlair_: The serpent's path is winding. What business have you in this cave, little lost sheep? Very well. I shall guide you to the serpent god you seek.
110611010.evoFlair_: Poke a bush and a snake may slither out. I know not what business you had with the serpent god... but it matters little. After all, you're about to be sacrificed to him.

111611020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Then deal 1 damage to an enemy.
111611020.baseFlair_: Go forth and convulse en masse. Come one, come all—old and young, gods and demons. Climax and intermingle, for you and your neighbor are but one and the same.
111611020.evoFlair_: From the shadow of provision comes forth unity. Bonded through desire, bound by lust—beasts, gods... all are united through pleasure. Rejoice, for you are one with the world.

112611020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, gain the ability to ignore Ward.
Fanfare: If this follower has at least 6 attack, gain Rush.
112611020.baseFlair_: Why does he train? Why does he lust for strength? Why does he fight? There are no answers to such questions. A berserker simply swings his axe.
112611020.evoFlair_: At the end of the training, the fighting, and the quest for strength, lies meaning for the berserker. Having swung his axe, he finds the answers he seeks.

116611020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If any other allied Bloodstained Berserkers have been played this match, gain Storm.
116611020.baseFlair_: Not so fast. I take payment up front, milord. Oh, it's not much... Just a bit of pain and fresh, steaming blood. What? Don't have the nerve to pay?
116611020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116611020.evoFlair_: I've received your payment of... Ah yes. An ounce of pain and a pound of blood, with all the rancor oozing forth. Oh, and you needn't worry. I'll see the mission through—I swear it on your life.

117611030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Give +1/+1 to all allied Bloodcraft followers. If Vengeance is active for you, give +2/+2 instead.
117611030.baseFlair_: Mortal commanders rally their troops with charisma and compensation. A demonic commander inspires his underlings with dread and duress.
117611030.evoFlair_:
"Even now, everything makes me jumpy."
"I wake up wondering, 'How did I survive?'"
"A demon even demons feared."
"Never accept his invitation to dine. Never."
—Excerpts from the Psych Evals of Retired Soldiers

119611040.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, draw a card.
119611040.baseFlair_: To us demons, humans are like uncut gems. I'm always on the lookout for any that have the potential to shine brighter than others. There's nothing better than seeing a complete nobody rise above the pack!
119611040.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119611040.evoFlair_: Well, aren't you a diamond in the rough? A soul like yours doesn't come along every day... Will you be a doer of great deeds, or a vessel of terrible destruction? The choice is yours. What do you say? Want to form a contract with me?

100621020.baseFlair_: Strength, beauty—these are my desires, and it is only the magic armor that can fulfill them. With each drop of blood it absorbs, it becomes more glowingly beautiful!
100621020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. Then restore 2 defense to your leader.
100621020.evoFlair_: No, it's still not enough. More sacrifices must be made! Monsters, dragons, angels—everything must be sacrificed in the name of strength and beauty! I pray for the blood that will make me beautiful!

101621040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy amulet if Vengeance is active for you.
101621040.baseFlair_: "Contaminate the earth..." "Devour human souls..." "Return the world to darkness..."
101621040.evoFlair_: "My right hand devours the light..." "My left hand repels all hope..." "The weak deserve only death..."

102621010.baseFlair_: I'm a devil. An adorable devil who gets adventurers like you lost so I can toy with them.
102621010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower if Vengeance is active for you.
102621010.evoFlair_: Confusion, exhaustion, and finally starvation. When adventurers despair, I take them out of their misery. To us, despair is the most delicious spice there is!

106621010.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Ward.
Fanfare: Give another allied Bloodcraft follower the following effect - Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
106621010.baseFlair_:
As fluid as she is sharp, her sword pierces her enemies like a snakebite.
"Trespassing isn't permitted in my territory!"
106621010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
106621010.evoFlair_:
She commands a magic serpentine blade, giving her power over life and death.
"I won't let you lay a hand on my sisters!"

110621010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If an allied follower was destroyed this turn, deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Last Words: Deal 4 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
110621010.baseFlair_:
Look closely at that face... it is stricken by both rage and sadness. It weeps over the cruel future awaiting you, and simmers with rage at its eternal hunger.
—Prologue, At the Shadows' Edge
110621010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
110621010.evoFlair_:
If its sadness cannot be abated, it must be razed by anger. The anger that goes uncalmed will be drowned in sadness. Whichever the elemental's humor, your best strategy is avoidance.
—Chapter 2, At the Shadows' Edge

113621020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Assembly Droid into your hand.
113621020.baseFlair_:
Core mutations have led to one new optimization after another. The Metal-Blade Demon, for example, arms its body and binds itself with steel. Some others cover their kin in iron and force them to serve.
—Secrets of Sorcery Demystified II
113621020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Repair Mode into your hand. Recover 2 play points.
113621020.evoFlair_:
Losing yourself to rage and swinging your strength about? There once was a time when I did that too. It's different now with children in my life. But it isn't so bad. I've grown rather fond of the little ones.
—Mechaforge Devil to Metal-Blade Demon

114621010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw cards until there are 5 cards in your hand.
114621010.baseFlair_: Yeek! W-was that a vampire!? No... wait... It was just my own footsteps. Yeesh... I'll never make it if I keep jumping at shadows like this. That's right... I've gotta work hard if I'm gonna save the beautiful damsels of the world!
114621010.evoFlair_: Found you, vampire! You fiend! Carrying off all these beautiful damsels! I'm so jeal—I, I mean! I'm so angry at you! Prepare yourself for... Hm? You're actually kind of fetching yourself... Lemme just take a closer... Hey, come back!

121621020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy all enemy followers that cost 1 play point or less. If you have at least 20 cards with different names in your deck, destroy all enemy followers that cost 3 play points or less instead.
121621020.baseFlair_: Imps may be small and low-grade food sources, but they're plentiful and easy to hunt; just right for replenishing your dark energies. Besides, this isn't the kind of job where you can expect five-star meals to be served on a platter.
121621020.evoFlair_: Ugly, isn't it? This is what happens when a fiend lets their demonic energies loose. I'm used to the reactions, though. I didn't take this job because I wanted glory. As long as others can live peacefully, I'll keep doing the work, no matter how dirty or vile.

123621020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
123621020.baseFlair_:
Don't try running from the ebon lion, even if he sets the village ablaze. Stay in your homes. You might survive the fire, but nothing survives him.
—Village Wisdom
123621020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
123621020.evoFlair_:
However, if the moon is full, you must flee. You need not outrun the lion, only the other villagers—and the swarms of ravenous creatures drawn like moths to the flame.
—Village Wisdom

101631040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Bane and Drain if Vengeance is active for you.
101631040.baseFlair_: One nondescript day the seemingly interminable war ended. But not a soul stood atop the battlefield to claim victory—that is, except a blood-starved demon.
101631040.evoFlair_: Lusting only to reap blood and flesh wholesale, this devil saves his sickle for the battlefield. A merciless judge, he metes out bladed justice to the wretched who devote themselves to petty squabbles.

107631020.baseEffect_:
Drain.
Whenever an allied follower evolves, this follower gains +1/+0 while in your hand.
107631020.baseFlair_: Feast on their terror, for our reign begins now! From the Depths, we have arisen—let us feast on every pigment of life.
107631020.evoFlair_: Silently expanding, our malevolence lurks and creeps in the shadows. Don't look behind you now... Gwahaha!

109631020.baseFlair_: D-do you dislike me now? What did I do wrong this time? Maybe I was standing too close? I guess I was getting a little too familiar...
109631020.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower. Deal damage to your leader until their defense drops to 10 if Vengeance is not active for you.
109631020.evoFlair_: So... You weren't mad at me? Thank goodness! If there's anything you want me to do for you, let me know! I'll be right there to take care of it all!

110631020.baseEffect_:
Invocation: During your third turn or later, if your leader has taken damage for the fourth time this turn, invoke this card.
Last Words: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
110631020.baseFlair_: Let me weave you a lie. My eyes shoot flame, but I would never harm a living creature. I have a great many other tales to spin for the ears of ill-mannered louts such as yourself.
110631020.evoEffect_: Last Words: Restore 5 defense to your leader.
110631020.evoFlair_: I see my words fall upon deaf ears. Pity. I will have to find some other way to teach you of wisdom, battle, and honor.

110631030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put an Aza & Iza, Feline Maids or Demon Song into your hand.
110631030.baseFlair_: Thanks for coming out to our concert tonight! Are you ready Aza? Ready Iza? Then it's time for our first number: "The Hottest Spring in Hell"!
110631030.evoFlair_:
It's nearly time for our finale! Don't cry, now, or you'll make us cry, too! Here goes "Rivenbrandt Requiem"!
Ugh, I'm beat... I deserve a nice long bath when I get home.

113631010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. If Vengeance is active for you, deal 6 damage instead.
113631010.baseFlair_: If you have pride in your heart, you must hunger for downfall. Because you can be nothing but powerless while bound by the rules of gods... In the depths of depravity and downfall, your pride will shine as never before.
113631010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Change your leader's maximum defense to 10. Give your leader the following effect: Can't take more than 3 damage at a time. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
113631010.evoFlair_: Falling on account of so-called morals and ideals... Pathetic! Those too afraid to choose the fallen path themselves are doomed to constant change. But a proud soul like mine is wholly eternal!

118631020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
118631020.baseFlair_: Just as fools desire change, sinners desire transformation. Equilibrium is the true keeper of the peace. If you wish to open up new possibilities... then you must pay the price. Are you prepared? My twin blades of dark and light will test your resolve.
118631020.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Drain.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
118631020.evoFlair_: The world is a cradle, or a small box garden; merely a toy meant to lull us into a sense of peace. Yet those who came before spilled blood and shed tears to build it. If you would still forge ahead... then you must show me your resolve by overcoming this trial.

119631010.baseEffect_:
Can't attack.
Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, destroy a random enemy follower and restore 3 defense to your leader.
At the end of your turn, if Avarice is active for you, gain +2/+0.
