109631010.evoFlair_: You've branded me as evil, but have you taken a look at yourselves? I was born with this hatred. But this pain you've inflicted upon me... It is you who are the truly evil ones here!

110631010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to your leader and draw 2 cards. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader, and your opponent draws 1 card.
110631010.baseFlair_: People fear what is different, but if we meld our dissimilarities, then there would be nothing left to fear, so go forth and convulse en masse. Assenters, dissenters, and objectors alike, come together in commensurate affection.
110631010.evoFlair_:
The Third Provision: Intermingle
All conflicts and wars are the product of discrepant views and insufficient empathy. Mix, intermingle, ravish, enrapture, and save this world. —Teachings from the Manor of Lust

114631010.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: If Avarice is active for you, gain Storm.
114631010.baseFlair_: Wahahaha! You've really shaped up from the sad little crybaby you used to be! We've been fated to fight since birth! So let's make the most of it! Taste my ultimate technique! Nightmarish Descent!
114631010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114631010.evoFlair_:
Nightmarish Descent! That single attack brings devastation raining down from the sky, drilling through the earth just like Venomous Stakes!
—The mysterious Masked Scholar

114631030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of times that your leader was damaged during your turn in this match.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader and 5 damage to an enemy follower.
114631030.baseFlair_: I'm a greedy man—there is no limit to my desires. So I'll take my compensation up front, thanks. Don't expect any more work from me than you pay for.
114631030.evoFlair_: Your delusion in itself is my compensation. I feed on humans' feelings and their greed. When I tire of yours... I'm sure I'll devour you too.

121631020.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (10)
During your opponent's turn, whenever an enemy follower attacks, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon a Malevolent Wall.
----------
During your opponent's turn, whenever an enemy follower attacks, randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Summon a Cursed Stone.
-Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
-Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. Restore 2 defense to your leader.
121631020.baseFlair_: Beware, for the walls have ears. And arms. And a will most malevolent. Keep this lesson in mind if you would enter the labyrinth: the things you ought to fear are not the monsters you can see, but the walls that can see you.
121631020.evoFlair_: A survivor was rescued from the labyrinth, gibbering and insane with fear. When he regained consciousness, he shot up like an arrow from his sickbed and began screaming. "The walls! The walls are closing in! Let me out, let me out, LET ME OUT!!!"

101641030.baseEffect_: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you. Then give -2/-0 to this follower.
101641030.baseFlair_: Hey, why so glum! You're mine now. You should be delighted! Come on, smile! I want to see you smile!
101641030.evoFlair_: All you have to do is listen to what I say. You're a good kid, and I want to give you a reward. Something special. Here, taste this wine; it's made with my own blood. Taste it, and we'll be bound together forever.

102641010.baseEffect_: During your turn, deal any damage dealt to your leader to the enemy leader instead.
102641010.baseFlair_: Blood is so very hot and stimulating. You really should try coloring yourself with it.
102641010.evoFlair_: Injury, pain, seeping blood... I simply revel in them! I'll stain you in blood again and again.

106641020.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - Once on each of your turns, when your leader takes damage, deal 3 damage to all enemies. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
106641020.baseFlair_: Those who revere the gods reach sacred lands, but those who revile the gods arrive at terrifying places. The serpent's writhing foretells naught but woe. Your only hope is to cast off your humanity—so go ahead, drink up. —The Forgotten Play, Witch's lines
106641020.evoFlair_: The serpent's bite delivers curses, not venom. These hexes have the power to destroy humans, twisting their very form. Flesh melted, bones broken—you'll become the beast of the demon's land. —The Forgotten Play, Witch's lines

107641010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give both leaders the following effect - At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
107641010.baseFlair_: You called us demons. You called us monsters. You called for our demise. Unfortunately for you, we survived. Now its our turn to hunt—this night of enchantment has just begun!
107641010.evoFlair_: You tried to drown us. Now we will drown this world into the abyss—hatred, disgust, all of your despicable traits. Your nights of tranquility have ended, for this night will be stained in blood!

109641030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Give your leader the following effect: At the start of your next turn, lose 3 play points.
109641030.baseFlair_: Ominous clouds, thunderous tremors, a strike of lightning. The manifestation of fury is an unyielding hammer—incinerating all fighting spirit and divine wills.
109641030.evoFlair_: Pressure builds and releases, tearing the heavens asunder. The manifestation of cruelty is an inescapable hammer—all shall be eradicated without discrimination.

110641030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, gain Storm.
Fanfare: If you have 2 other cards or less in your hand, gain Drain. If you have 0 cards in your hand, gain +3/+1.
110641030.baseFlair_: Eat humans? I could never. Like, they're huuuman—they're weaker than the bugs we've got in hell. No, no, it's way more fun to cut them, dice them, slice them, stab them, impale them, maim them... I could go on!
110641030.evoFlair_: Humans scream, like, a lot. Oh, and they cry too. I guess that's how you know they're squishy. Do you know how to make 'em real upset? It's all right if you don't know—I'll show ya...

112641010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 3 Serpents.
At the end of your turn, give Bane to a random allied Serpent.
At the end of your turn, give Ward to a random allied Serpent.
112641010.baseFlair_:
"You'll pay if you take us lightly!"
Anacondas, vipers, pythons. All snakes become her shield.
"I'll teach you how scary snakes can be!"
They bare their fangs at any who would trespass against their princess.
112641010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Medusiana into your hand.
At the end of your turn, give Bane to a random allied Serpent.
At the end of your turn, give Ward to a random allied Serpent.
112641010.evoFlair_:
"Come, Medusiana!"
One that could swallow a dragon whole, answers her call.
"Playtime is over! Rip them to shreds!"
All those who oppose the princess of snakes will find themselves as mere field mice before her noble steed.

101624020.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
Draw a card if Vengeance is active for you.

117624010.baseEffect_: Deal 4 damage to all enemy followers. Then, if Vengeance is active for you, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
117624010.baseFlair_: Just try running from these silver chains! You'll be cleansed by their blue flames yet!

713624010.baseEffect_: Deal 4 damage to all enemy followers. Then, if Vengeance is active for you, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
713624010.baseFlair_: You have no country to defend! Nothing to avenge! You also don't have a shred of ambition! Someone with no reason to fight should just leave!

101634010.baseEffect_:
If Vengeance is active for you, this card costs 4 less.
----------
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Restore 2 defense to your leader.
101634010.baseFlair_: Why stop there when there's much more life left?

900644020.baseEffect_:
Evolve all allied Machina followers.
Evolve effects will not activate for those followers.
900644020.baseFlair_: Disengaging safeguards. Alpha Drive. —Mono, Garnet Rebel

100611040.baseFlair_: Revolution? Rebellion? Simply delightful! I just live for chaos! May you be the first witness to my swift and ghastly reign of terror! Well, don't just stand there. Help me!
100611040.evoFlair_: War is just wonderful! Nothing beats the sight of fallen soldiers! Let's make this battle so gruesome they'll talk about it for ages. Well, come on! Hurry up and let me do my work!

101611120.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 and Ward if Vengeance is active for you.
101611120.baseFlair_: His skin is like steel, impervious to inferior blades.
101611120.evoFlair_: Unbreakable mettle encased in impenetrable steel.

102611030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+2 if Vengeance is active for you.
102611030.baseFlair_: The lowly demon was summoned to the battlefield bound in chains. Even soldiers were reduced to shreds before the creature's overwhelming violence.
102611030.evoFlair_: The beastly demon broke its chains to taste freedom at last. No longer a thrall to its master's orders, the demon was instead bound by its feral instincts.

103611060.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain +2/+0 and deal 2 damage to your leader.
103611060.baseFlair_: Present your offering to me, little one, and I'll obey your every command. I'll even call you master...
103611060.evoFlair_: As long as you do what I require, I'll follow you. I'll fulfill my end of our bargain. Now what do you wish of me, my sweet master?

115611030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon 2 Serpents.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. If Vengeance is active for you, restore 3 defense to your leader.
115611030.baseFlair_: Poison is medicine. Take, for example, the venomous cobra: the potent poison it stores in its body acts as a catalyst for the unbelievable speed of its growth.
115611030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115611030.evoFlair_: Medicine is poison. Take, for example, the cobra's venom: it blisters human skin and eats away at rock and earth.

118611030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (3): Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Summon an Arcane Personnel Carrier.
Last Words: Summon a Roulette Vampire.
----------
Rush.
Last Words: Summon an Arcane Personnel Carrier.
118611030.baseFlair_: Oh, is this your first time at the casino? Welcome! I do hope you enjoy your stay. Will you bet on red or black first? Or will you risk it all on one number? Either way, I'll give you a tip: don't look away. Now, let's give the wheel a spin! —Diamond Casino, Topaz Floor
118611030.evoFlair_:
Your straight-up bet paid off. Good job on spotting my little trick, too! My gaze determines into which pocket the ball will fall. This time I cajoled it from one to ten. Yes, cajoled. Didn't you know the ball is alive?
—Diamond Casino, Topaz Floor

121611030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Deal 1 damage to your leader. Draw a card.
----------
Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower. Then, if Wrath is active for you, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
121611030.baseFlair_: In the past, it was common for villages to choose one household as a sacrifice. In exchange, the sacrifices received anything their hearts desired. Of course, this arrangement was doomed to fail, for monsters can't be expected to play by humans' rules.
121611030.evoFlair_: The act of selecting sacrifices—or live bait, if you will—died out. The monsters, having developed a taste for destruction and mayhem, grew increasingly violent. Starved for carnage, their rampage spread like a plague, until no villages were safe.

123611020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, gain +2/+2 and destroy an enemy follower.
123611020.baseFlair_: Let's fight to the death, comrades. We'll duke it out all the way to the gates of hell. I got this sweet new sword and arm just so we could have ourselves a nice little bloodbath.
123611020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
123611020.evoFlair_: I don't care if you're a lowly fiend or an archdemon. I made this pact knowing that I was hellbound. If we're all going the same way, I'll take as many of you down with me as I can.

103621040.baseEffect_: Clash: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
103621040.baseFlair_: That day we learned that anything big enough can threaten our world. —Battalion report
103621040.evoFlair_: A single swipe of the behemoth's hand was all it took to scatter three platoons. Honestly, to see it felt more like looking at a natural disaster than at combat. —Battalion report

106621020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
106621020.baseFlair_: The twilight signals the coming of the demon wolf and her sinister howl. The freezing wind signals the death of a god at her fangs. Her fangs should be feared; her claws rend the battlefield. —Tale of the Demon Wolf
106621020.evoFlair_: The demon wolf who hungers for blood will consume the sky and crush the earth. She hunts tirelessly for the heart of the spear-wielding god. Her hatred should be feared; her fury will bring the end. —Tale of the Demon Wolf

109621020.baseFlair_: I do say, any cretin foolish enough to make an enemy of the Erste Empire will be met with the fiercest opposition! Or I am not captain of the finest imperial forces!
109621020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to this follower.
109621020.evoFlair_: To think that you vermin would be this strong... You've left me with no choice. I'll show you the power of dark essence, the very limits of our technology! Behold our true strength!

111621010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw 3 cards.
Last Words: Deal 3 damage to your leader.
111621010.baseFlair_: What is treasure to your eyes is trash to a demon's. Yet you covet what is treasure to a demon's eyes as well. No negotiation is needed when one deals in deception. —Words of Belphegor
111621010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111621010.evoFlair_: The truly wise wouldn't go around striking deals with demons. Fools who thought themselves to be cunning all met with the same fate... I have all the time in the world to play with my food. —Words of Belphegor

101631060.baseEffect_: Follower Strike: Destroy the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
101631060.baseFlair_: You've got something against my hair? Well, you've got guts; I'll give you that! I don't take kindly to those who mock my flowing locks though. Prepare to be turned to stone!
101631060.evoFlair_: Cry all you like; your fate is sealed! You've insulted me, and now it's time to pay the price! Show me your snakiest, dear little darlings!

105631020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw 2 cards. Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader for each Neutral card drawn.
105631020.baseFlair_: Humans are beasts, beasts that prowl in search of answers. Such peculiar creatures! Meow-ha-ha!
105631020.evoFlair_: Answers aren't anything you find through searching. Like shadows, they're always there by your side. Meow-ha-ha!

113631020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, subtract 1 from the cost of 2 Bloodcraft cards (excluding Heartsick Demon) in your hand.
113631020.baseFlair_: Tragic tales of lost love, romance between beast and lady—it is but words that bind their passions. Young romps take to the skies of blue, a couple's ardent devotion, fated life-long loves! As a watchful guardian over their love, I must see all stories through to the end.
113631020.evoFlair_:
There's nothing quite like it... The joy of shared bliss, the pity of a missed connection.
Those two... They're together! They're a couple!
Oh, I musn't engage, but my feelings of passion must be heard! Ah... Love! Wonderful, bittersweet love!

113631030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, recover 2 evolution points.
113631030.baseFlair_:
She values her friends and wants no harm to come to them. If only she were to fight alone, the others wouldn't need to get hurt.
"May... Leave this to the grown-ups!"
—The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 3
113631030.evoFlair_:
She's their valued friend, so they don't want her to be all alone. And if everyone fought together, she wouldn't need to be.
"You're a nincompoop, Moriana!"
—The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 4

114631020.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (1)
Last Words: If it is your turn, put a random Natura card from your deck into your hand. If it is your opponent's turn, draw a card.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, deal 2 damage to all enemy followers instead.
114631020.baseFlair_:
Vampires are creatures who have cast off the shackles of fate to live beyond the bounds of common sense. Even so. That one. Is. Different. The way. She moves. Should I. Give in? To madness?
—A historian's scrawled journal entry
114631020.evoFlair_:
Unshackled. Unshackled. Shackledun. Dun, dun, dun. Dunshackledun vampire. She will. Take it. From you. What you cherish. Most. With hands. Fingers. Face. She will. Devour. Your strength. Born. Of madness.
—Twisted scrawl

122631010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to all enemies. Activate Vengeance until the end of your next turn, even if your leader's defense is greater than 10.
122631010.baseFlair_:
Strength.
I must become stronger—stronger than anyone else. It's the only way.
—Luca Yonazuki
122631010.evoFlair_:
Power.
If I just had more power, I could make something happen.
—Luca Yonazuki

101641010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon 2 Forest Bats and give allied Forest Bats Ward.
101641010.baseFlair_: I use blood to grant myself eternal life. To fulfill a promise I made long ago. To fulfill a vow I made in the name of joy and in the name of loss.
101641010.evoFlair_: My eternal life has but one purpose: to fulfill the promise I made on the day of the blood exchange. It is a vow that transcends eternity.

701641010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon 2 Forest Bats and give allied Forest Bats Ward.
701641010.baseFlair_: I use blood to grant myself eternal life. To fulfill a promise I made long ago. To fulfill a vow I made in the name of joy and in the name of loss.
701641010.evoFlair_: My eternal life has but one purpose: to fulfill the promise I made on the day of the blood exchange. It is a vow that transcends eternity.

105641010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effects - You will not gain a play point at the start of your turn. At the end of your turn, draw a card and deal 1 damage to the enemy leader. (These effects last for the rest of the match.)
105641010.baseFlair_: The flow of time is difficult to stop for most, but for me it's so simple. Stay beautiful and dream for eternity.
105641010.evoFlair_: Permanence is just another name for death. But what of it? In this world nothing's sweeter than eternity!

108641010.baseEffect_:
If you have at least 6 play points, and Vengeance is active for you, Choose: Play this card as a Kind Queen Vania or Blood Queen Vania.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to both leaders. Then summon a Forest Bat.
108641010.baseFlair_: Someday I'm gonna be a queen. Hey, bloodkin, what should I do then?
108641010.evoFlair_: Hey, bloodkin! You're still gonna be my bloodkin even after I'm queen. Stay with me forever and ever, and be nice to me forever and ever!

112641030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If you have at least 7 other cards in your hand, gain Drain.
Fanfare: If you have 3 to 5 other Machina cards in your hand, gain Rush. If you have at least 6 other Machina cards in your hand, gain Storm.
112641030.baseFlair_: I've finally understood why the monsters were collecting mechanical parts. Holy water, sunlight, stakes—nothing penetrates the carapace they've made. That armor is nigh invulnerable. —Vampire Hunter's Notes, Part 3
112641030.evoFlair_: Go ahead, bask in the sweet luster of my steel. You can see why I've adorned my claws—and my very body—in this material. Is there a more fitting symbol of flawlessness? Is there a more fitting path to new, bloodred beauty?

114641010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Destroy an enemy follower with 4 defense or less. Deal 1 damage to your leader.
----------
Fanfare: Destroy 2 enemy followers. If Vengeance is not active for you, give your leader the following effect - At the start of your next turn, lose 2 play points.
114641010.baseFlair_: I have no tolerance for boors. They are not welcome on my island. If you insist on running amok here... prepare yourself. My blade is of far more costly make than you.
114641010.evoFlair_: Cross your heart and hope to die. Your drunken fugue ends here. You'll pay the price of your rampage with your head. Those are the rules.

714641010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Destroy an enemy follower with 4 defense or less. Deal 1 damage to your leader.
----------
Fanfare: Destroy 2 enemy followers. If Vengeance is not active for you, give your leader the following effect - At the start of your next turn, lose 2 play points.
714641010.baseFlair_: I have no tolerance for boors. They are not welcome on my island. If you insist on running amok here... prepare yourself. My blade is of far more costly make than you.
714641010.evoFlair_: Cross your heart and hope to die. Your drunken fugue ends here. You'll pay the price of your rampage with your head. Those are the rules.

116641010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Flood Behemoth and give it Ward. If Avarice is active for you, evolve this follower.
116641010.baseFlair_: Scared? Don't be. You're mine... My lovely, lovely toy. I will let nothing touch you.
116641010.evoEffect_: Strike: Give -2/-2 to all enemy followers. (Followers are destroyed when their defense drops below 1.)
116641010.evoFlair_: Your pleasure... is my pleasure. I will protect you. I will sweep you into my chest; I will bare my fangs at your enemies. Now come, my toy. Entertain me.

119641010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Skybound Art (10) - Summon a Seox, Heavenly Howl.
Super Skybound Art (15): Summon 2 Seox, Heavenly Howls instead.
Strike: Gain Storm and the following effect - The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0. Then remove this Strike effect.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
119641010.baseFlair_: You've piqued my interest. You remind me of that man... the one who saved me from the dark and the loneliness. I'd like to observe your power— H-hey! Stop that! Don't touch my mask!
119641010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119641010.evoFlair_: This power led to my clan's ruin. I hated it... and was also afraid of it. But you said you can count on me. Now, I look upon my power as a source of pride.

123641020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Bane.
Ward.
Strike: Give your leader the following effect until the start of your next turn - Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
123641020.baseFlair_: In their hubris, the gods created a demon whose sole purpose was to bear the world's pain in perpetuity. Trapped in his agony and denied even the mercy of death, he thought of a way to end it all.
123641020.evoFlair_: My lungs ulcerate, my nerves scream in agony, my skin burns. Always. Forever. I experience the pain of a hundred years in one day. The world must be brought to a swift conclusion. Only then can I rest.

900641020.baseEffect_:
Drain.
Fanfare: Summon a Forest Bat.
Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, give it Ward.
900641020.baseFlair_: Is this what it's like to be a queen? All nice and warm? Then that's what I'll be! C'mon, bloodkin, gimme a big hug!
900641020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900641020.evoFlair_: You're happy when I'm nice, aren't you, bloodkin? Then I'll be nice to you forever and ever! That's what bloodkin are for!

900641030.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Summon a Forest Bat.
Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, give it Bane.
900641030.baseFlair_: Is this what it's like to be a queen? When the bad guys come, I'll fight for you guys, bloodkin! I'll beat up all your enemies!
900641030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900641030.evoFlair_: If I fight with you, you'll be happy, right, bloodkin? Then we can be together forever and ever. I'll fight for you, bloodkin!

104614010.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Then give +3/+3 to a random allied follower.
104614010.baseFlair_: "Vampire, prepare yourse..." —Last words of a vampire hunter

100624010.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to all allies and enemies.
100624010.baseFlair_: Tonight blood will rain from the skies.

107634010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to all followers.
If Vengeance is active for you, recover 3 play points.

106611010.baseEffect_: Clash: Gain +3/+0. Deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
106611010.baseFlair_: From the day that I vowed my love to him, everything that I am became his. But, no, I don't believe I'm being used. After all, he told me that he would make me his wife!
106611010.evoFlair_: There's no way he would betray me. What good would it do him? I won't let him run, I won't let him go, and I won't let him off. Haha—he's going to have to take responsibility.

120611020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Restore 3 defense to your leader. Draw a card.
----------
Rush.
Clash: Restore 3 defense to your leader. Draw a card.
120611020.baseFlair_:
In nature, the tail of the scorpion is akin to a lure—its body is the real threat. There is, however, nothing natural about this specimen. Both the mouth and tail of this abomination hungrily seek prey.
—Desert Ecology, Fiendish Beasts
120611020.evoFlair_:
There is meaning in life, both natural and unnatural. With its two mouths and one stomach, the two-headed scorpion maximizes consumption of all life, down to tufts of desert moss.
—Desert Ecology, Fiendish Beasts

100621010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower if Vengeance is active for you.
100621010.baseFlair_: With every cry of rage his chains grow tighter, and every squeeze of the cold metal against his raw wounds feeds his anger. And so the cycle of torment continues.
100621010.evoFlair_: Eventually the chains were unable to contain his fury. Set free from his purgatory, he rampaged through the underworld in search of those that shackled him.

101621050.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Restore 4 defense to your leader if Vengeance is active for you.
101621050.baseFlair_: My brothers! Have pride in your lineage, your tenacity, your wisdom, your eternal lives! We are the chosen ones! We are the bloodline of darkness!
101621050.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101621050.evoFlair_: Feel the dark blood coursing through your veins, my brothers, and kneel before me! I am the true leader of our bloodline! Bow your heads and offer your eternal loyalty!

102621020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
102621020.baseFlair_: Pathetic weaklings! Know why you stand before me. Without destruction there can be no creation!
102621020.evoFlair_: Tremble in awe before the destruction I sow! Soon your body and soul will be no more!

122621020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Deal 1 damage to your leader. Summon an Arcane Wolf.
(Can only Accelerate if your leader took damage during your turn this turn.)
----------
Rush.
Bane.

122621020.baseFlair_: The wolf gains on its prey; paws hammering the earth faster than the creature's frantic heartbeat. It consumes every part of the creature's being, claiming its power.
122621020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
122621020.evoFlair_: With little but shreds of the creature remaining, the wolf turns its bloody maw to the dim moon above. It lets out a terrible howl—a warning.

103631020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, draw a card.
103631020.baseFlair_: The battlefield is my beloved; I want to keep fighting even after my mortal days are through. So I bound myself to a demon, thus transforming the warrior I was into the warfiend I am.
103631020.evoFlair_: My cheeks warped as my fangs grew in, and my forehead split to make way for my horns. But these trivial changes did nothing to change what I really want: war. War that rages throughout the ages!

104631020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Whenever another follower is destroyed, gain +1/+0.
104631020.baseFlair_: I'd be happy to help relieve you of all those pesky attachments. So satisfy me with what remains of your soul!
104631020.evoFlair_: I know how much it hurts and how irritating it is, so offer yourself to me as sustenance. I'll transform your lowly regrets into sublime tragedy!

105631010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet. Gain Storm if Vengeance is active for you.
105631010.baseFlair_: Time for fun and games! The enemy forces will be wiped out at my hands, and I'll bear victory and glory.
105631010.evoFlair_: Games are only fun for the victor! Losing's not worth a thing whether you're trounced or knicked. That's why I'll win and keep winning.

106631010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 2 Serpents.
Whenever an allied Serpent comes into play, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
106631010.baseFlair_:
Her mystic eye feeds on the mind, while her scalekin devour the body. As the oldest sister of the snake goddess, she is an especially cruel ruler.
"Your body, your mind—I'll consume it all."
106631010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
106631010.evoFlair_:
A cold grin crosses her lips as she raises her whip. She enjoys playing with and tormenting her prey, never letting them escape.
"I'll go ahead and say it—I'm not as lenient as my sisters."

117631010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Deal 1 damage to your leader. Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
----------
Rush.
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, deal 4 damage to an enemy and restore 4 defense to your leader.
117631010.baseFlair_: Indeed I am the Seven of Swords, mark of inequity. Vows be broken, contracts be damned. I live for myself. I invite you to partake in foul inequity and frivolous injustice for my amusement.
117631010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117631010.evoFlair_: Allow me to whisper sweet nightmares into your ears. Everyone is merely a piece in a bigger game. Friend or foe, I make no distinction. I just want to sneer at the world.

120631020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, randomly put 1 of the highest-cost Bloodcraft followers from your deck into play. Otherwise, deal damage to your leader until their defense drops to 10, and recover 6 play points.
120631020.baseFlair_:
"The world drowned in the deluge, sparing the righteous people aboard the ark. That's how the story goes... but the truth must be told. We found the ark... or rather, the sinister blight it had become."
—Explorer's Scrawled Notes
120631020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120631020.evoFlair_:
"The flood wasn't meant to punish man; it was meant to destroy the fiend, though all attempts were unsuccessful. Instead, the daemon was sealed and set afloat on the ark. But heaven help us, we unsealed it. The ark of calamity—"
—Explorer's Cut-Off Notes

103641010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
103641010.baseFlair_: It consumed the blood of all living things. It drank until people, dragons, and demons alike ran dry. And each time it drank, its body changed. It gained knowledge. It gained claws and fangs. It gained wings. All it lost was its sanity.
103641010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
103641010.evoFlair_: It constantly ached. It constantly thirsted. Its irrepressible, unstoppable, inescapable thirst became an urge rooted in its very being. Vampires fear it as the fate that lies in store for those who lose themselves to the thirst.

108641020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy. X equals the number of times that your leader was damaged during your turn in this match.
108641020.baseFlair_: Sleep is a product of the beast that consumes the darkness... and those within it. —Chapter 1, A History of Night
108641020.evoFlair_: Humans came to fear the night on account of something that confines them for all eternity. —Chapter 3, A History of Night

110641020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly destroy 3 other followers. If Vengeance is not active for you, deal 7 damage to your leader.
110641020.baseFlair_: Rage burgeons and swathes itself in layers of hatred, despair, ruin, and madness. It spins into the form of a demonic fist. White- and black-winged alike are blown away in a wave of indiscriminate, unreasoning violence.
110641020.evoEffect_: Evolve: If Vengeance is active for you, randomly deal 1 damage to a leader or another follower. Do this 9 times.
110641020.evoFlair_: No one knows what passion, what frustration, reverberates in that echoing howl. Before they can learn, all who hear it are returned to dust.

114641020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to your leader. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
114641020.baseFlair_:
At last we have found the dark deity. Let us fall to our knees in reverence. The abnormal bat, werewolf, and vampire. All. Sprang. From this. This font. The font of. Madness. Madness itself.
—Survey team captain's scrawled journal entry
114641020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give your leader the following effects.
-At the end of your turn, if you have at least 8 cards in your hand, randomly discard cards until you have 7, then deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals 2 times the number of cards discarded.
-At the start of your turn, draw a card.
(These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)
114641020.evoFlair_:
Great, great, great, great, great deity. No. Myself? Your power. Please. Stop? It will spread. Outward. Without. Cease. No good. Madness.
—Twisted scrawl

118641010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are no duplicate cards in your deck (excluding Volteo, Hedonistic Dealer), deal 5 damage to all other followers and give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, summon an Arcane Personnel Carrier, then put a random follower (excluding Volteo, Hedonistic Dealer) from your deck into play. Do this 2 times. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
118641010.baseFlair_:
Ah, my fledgling star. Welcome. You have been selected as a candidate to become the newest casino manager! You just have to put it all on the line—position, wealth, life! Now the true gamble begins!
—Diamond Casino, Diamond Floor
118641010.evoFlair_:
Hah! This gamble was not a test of your prowess! It was all lies! I let you win from the very start! Well, you wagered your life and now it's time to collect! Bon appetit!
—Diamond Casino, Diamond Floor

119641020.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (3): Countdown (7)
At the start of your turn, restore 1 defense to your leader and, if you have more evolution points than your opponent, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
Last Words: Summon a Xeno Diablo.
----------
Last Words: If Vengeance is active for you, deal 4 damage to all enemies. If Avarice is active for you, deal 4 damage to all enemies. If Wrath is active for you, deal 4 damage to all enemies.
119641020.baseFlair_: From a bloodstained cape, flame-wreathed arms reach out to embrace animus. As the demon raises a fist, the heavens fall, blanketing the horizon in darkness. It is the hatred of countless souls incarnate; its smile is a harbinger of the end.
119641020.evoFlair_: The beginning of despair is the end of hope—and the decreed hour is come. From the primordial abyss shall flow an everlasting night that swallows the world. From the dungeon of darkness the abomination will smile, knowing its work is done.

121641020.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower, then deal 2 damage to the enemy leader and restore 2 defense to your leader. Do this 1 time. If Wrath is active for you, do this 3 times instead.
121641020.baseFlair_: These faces are emblems of my love; the manifestation of blood I have spilled for the world. I've become the beasts I've devoured—a small price to pay for love. Ah, are you afraid of me? That's fine, too. It'll all be over once the last monster has been slain.
121641020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
121641020.evoFlair_: There is no love in these faces! There never was! I've drowned myself in rivers of blood, writhed in pain under my own blade... So why does no one love me?! This body, these wounds, they were all for you! Oh, dear world, I love you... and that's why we'll die together.

122641010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Destroy 2 enemy followers. If Vengeance or Wrath is active for you, evolve this follower and restore 5 defense to your leader.
Clash: Deal 3 damage to the enemy follower.
Reduce damage from effects to 0.
Can't be destroyed by effects.
Last Words: Deal 5 damage to both leaders.
122641010.baseFlair_:
I once knew happiness. But the past is the past, so I keep moving forward... no matter what hardships await me.
—Luca Yonazuki
122641010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
122641010.evoFlair_:
With strength, I can save Shiori. I have to become stronger. That's why I play Shadowverse...
The time for Vengeance has come—Dark Emperor!
—Luca Yonazuki

715641010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Destroy 2 enemy followers. If Vengeance or Wrath is active for you, evolve this follower and restore 5 defense to your leader.
Clash: Deal 3 damage to the enemy follower.
Reduce damage from effects to 0.
Can't be destroyed by effects.
Last Words: Deal 5 damage to both leaders.
715641010.baseFlair_:
I once knew happiness. But the past is the past, so I keep moving forward... no matter what hardships await me.
—Luca Yonazuki
715641010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
715641010.evoFlair_:
With strength, I can save Shiori. I have to become stronger. That's why I play Shadowverse...
The time for Vengeance has come—Dark Emperor!
—Luca Yonazuki

122641030.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the start of your turn, if allied followers have evolved at least 6 times this match, invoke this card.
----------
Storm.
Drain.
Strike: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers. If Vengeance is active for you, deal 8 damage instead.
122641030.baseFlair_:
You managed to change, but I didn't. I guess it's obvious who my rival was always destined to be... It was you all along.
—Rei Saotome
122641030.evoFlair_:
I will rule over Shadowverse as its king! And then I'll keep winning and winning... because why even bother playing otherwise?
Bathe them in crimson! Bloodlust Demon!
—Rei Saotome

111611030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Deal 1 damage to all enemies.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
111611030.baseFlair_: A young lion, whelped in the darkest depths. Legend has it he once served as guardian angel to a great prophet, but the truth has been lost to time.
111611030.evoFlair_: A young lion, whelped in the darkest depths. He grants strength to the vengeful, spurring them on to retribution. Legend has it he himself yearns to rebel against the heavens, but the truth has been lost to time.

122611030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Deal 1 damage to your leader. Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to the enemy leader. Deal 6 damage to 2 random enemy followers.
122611030.baseFlair_: The humans let out a collective sigh of relief. Finally, the ogre was restrained! The ogre stared at the heavy ball and chain in disbelief—why had the humans given him a present?
122611030.evoFlair_: The humans' relieved gazes pleased the ogre greatly; he especially relished seeing them fade to wide-eyed despair when he started swinging the ball and chain over his head.

101631010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and draw a card.
101631010.baseFlair_: I am the living embodiment of revenge. I draw strength from the darkness within human hearts. Hatred... Envy... Soon this world will be filled with resentment!
101631010.evoFlair_: The world is filled with hatred, and the time for revenge is upon us! My dark arts shall skewer the hearts of the hypocrites and pin their souls to the tombstone of resentment!

102631010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change both leaders' defense to 10, either by restoring defense or by dealing damage.
102631010.baseFlair_: Though my soul may fall, I shall never bow my head to such weak, stunted creatures as mortals. I still possess a measure of pride.
102631010.evoFlair_: When the time came, we sounded the battle cry against the gods that deceived us... As fellow traitors, you are now compelled to follow me.

104641020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Maelstrom Serpent. Repeat until your area is full if Vengeance is active for you.
104641020.baseFlair_: The gigantic wriggling serpent is a maelstrom that swallows people, cities, cultures, and ideas alike, like a storm that blows away everything in its path.
104641020.evoFlair_: The tremendous, frenzied serpent is nothing less than a calamity that swallows the heavens and the earth. It crushes everything without discrimination, returning it to nothingness like some sort of divine judge.

105641020.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Strike: Deal 6 damage to the enemy leader if Ambush is active for this follower.
Last Words: Deal 6 damage to the enemy leader if Ambush is active for this follower.
105641020.baseFlair_: Afflicted and annihilated, one oozes into the ebon abyss. Look and fear, human. There lurks despair: one who preys on iniquitous flesh and the bones of the besmirched. —The Abyss, Chapter 2, Verse 4
105641020.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
Strike: Deal 8 damage to the enemy leader if Ambush is active for this follower.
Last Words: Deal 8 damage to the enemy leader if Ambush is active for this follower.
105641020.evoFlair_: Be drenched! Oh, cry out beyond the edge! All is swallowed and flows into the lightless depths. The day has begun—a day longer than eternity and shorter than a blink. —The Abyss, Finale, Verse 1

111641020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Transform each Bloodcraft card in your hand that originally costs 2 play points or less into a Crimson Burst.
111641020.baseFlair_: It was humans who spilled blood upon my soil. One good turn deserves another, so I'll see them painted in the same crimson. Yes, caught in my briars and pierced by my thorns... Oh, how red they'll bloom.
111641020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111641020.evoFlair_: The more blood my roses drink, the more crimson they bloom. Yes, this place is my paradise, but for those foolish humans, it is both purgatory and hell.

113641010.baseEffect_:
During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, if Vengeance is not active for you, reveal it, change your leader's maximum defense to 10, and then banish it.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy. Restore 4 defense to your leader.
113641010.baseFlair_:
"That vanilla stuff? A little boring, don't you think?"
One look into her eyes is all it takes to fall into the hells of romance.
"You can have it... a passionate love more intense than anything you've ever felt."
113641010.evoFlair_:
"I've lost my taste for those sweet, happy endings."
The incarnation of beauty itself smiled bewitchingly, her prey completely enraptured.
"But you'll give me what I really want, right? All I need is a taste of that bitter, delicious despair."

113641030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon a Voice of the Abyss.
----------
Ambush.
Strike: If Ambush is active for this follower, summon 3 Voices of the Abyss.
113641030.baseFlair_: Avert your eyes. Seal your breath. Even the ends of the heavens are unsafe from its grasps. Before you is a wretched garden, whose thorns prey on the skin of the ignorant. Turn around, and the voices of despair shall call you once more. —The Abyss, Chapter 3, Verse 6
113641030.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
Strike: If Ambush is active for this follower, summon 4 Voices of the Abyss.
113641030.evoFlair_:
His arm, in the deepest depths of its organs. Within the screaming throat, darkness blooms. The nightmare becometh real, bringing forth a new life. Ah... To be born with sin. A new song echoes.
—The Abyss, Finale, Verse 5

900641010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Bane.
Can attack up to 3 times per turn.
900641010.baseFlair_: "You'll have plenty of time to regret fighting us—when you're sitting in her stomach! Medusiana, swallow 'em whole!" —Medusa, controller of the great snake
900641010.evoFlair_: "Huh? Pointing your sword at the gorgon sisters? That's more than a little stupid! Medusiana—punish 'em!" —Medusa, controller of the great snake

101634020.baseEffect_:
If Vengeance is active for you, this card costs 4 less.
----------
Deal 8 damage to all followers.
101634020.baseFlair_: It takes days to make a world, but a second to destroy it.

108611020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to both leaders.
108611020.baseFlair_: Pain for all the earth. Woe, grief, and misfortune. Now cry your tears of agony!
108611020.evoFlair_: Cry, and let the pain drive you mad! No matter where you run, the pain I inflict will be there with you.

118611020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. If any allied amulets are in play, draw a card.
----------
Storm.
Fanfare: If any allied amulets are in play, recover 3 play points.
118611020.baseFlair_: Pain? What pain? I'm so pissed I forgot I'm even hurt! Oh, I'll cool down—after I punch a hole through your freaking face!
118611020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118611020.evoFlair_: Reason? Hell if I know. I'm so mad I forgot why I'm mad! Maybe pounding your face in will jog my memory!

101631050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to an enemy. Restore 5 defense to your leader.
101631050.baseFlair_: Naked is the human mind in my presence. By all means cling to your doubts. My talents allow me deep inside your mind. Now offer up your life to me.
101631050.evoFlair_: Step outside your facade and cast aside your mortal ties, for tonight we revel. Tonight you will surrender to the tantalizing taste of my company!

107641020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Demonic Storm and a Demonic Strike into your hand. If Vengeance is active for you, recover 6 play points.
This follower can't be damaged by spells.
107641020.baseFlair_: This deception of a world has gone stale. Let the demons roam freely, and reduce it to ash—the fire will rightfully return you all to the void.
107641020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107641020.evoFlair_: His demons are masters of deception. All colors of the heavens and earth will vanish before them.

115641030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Draw 2 cards.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower and then the enemy leader. If Wrath is active for you, deal 10 damage instead.
115641030.baseFlair_: When her roar resounds, the frozen soil cracks and a beam of light splits the sky. None who live should risk the queen's displeasure.
115641030.evoFlair_: At her second roar, even the skies shall pale in fear. The haughty queen of frozen earth is an ice-cloaked avatar of terror.

117641010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (0): Put an Unselfish Grace into your hand. If Avarice is active for you, put an Insatiable Desire into your hand instead.
----------
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
While this follower is in play, your leader has the following effects.
-Can't take more than 1 damage at a time.
-Whenever your leader takes damage, reduce the enemy leader's maximum defense by 3.
117641010.baseFlair_:
Truth is waste. Your world has been reshaped.
I am Temperance, patron of austerity.
There is only one necessity:
Reality.
117641010.evoFlair_:
Hopes. Dreams. Memories. These are tools of hedonism.
Sever all luxuries; leave only thy corporeal self.
Discard excess. Learn what is needed:
Rationality.

112631010.baseEffect_:
During your turn, whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to all enemies. If Vengeance is active for you, summon 2 Serpents and give all allied Serpents Ward.
112631010.baseFlair_: This is the form you find most alluring? How charming—how obscene—I'm rather fond of it. Well, time to get down to business. I'm here to damn you, after all.
112631010.evoFlair_: It's only natural to lose yourself to indulgence and madness. After all, I'm going to make this night last as long as I can. We'll see if your body lasts until morning.

123631020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Put an Eccentric Archdemon into your deck. Draw a card.
----------
Accelerate (4): Deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower. If X is at least 2, deal 4 damage to all enemies instead. X equals the number of other Eccentric Archdemons you've played using Accelerate this match.
----------
Accelerate (7): Restore 7 defense to your leader. Then, if X is at least 4, summon 2 Eccentric Archdemons.
----------
Storm.
123631020.baseFlair_: Behold my latest creation! Humans are so much fun and their culture is fascinating. I've decided to try my hand at what they call "avant-garde." I mean, straight up killing people is what philistines do, right?
123631020.evoFlair_: Humans are so creative! They've created so many ways to inflict pain on each other! Guess they can't afford to waste time, seeing as their lives are short and fragile. I need to step up my game... There's nothing more boring than just copying the work of the great masters.

109641020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (8): Destroy all allied followers and amulets. For each card, put a random follower that costs more than it from your deck into play.
----------
Storm.
Bane.
109641020.baseFlair_: After abducting the bodies of the living, he transfigures them completely. Assembled are instruments of resentment to perform malicious symphonies for his orchestra of slaughter.
109641020.evoFlair_: The tones are striking and coarse—too intense for a human to endure. His otherworldly music twists the ears and crumples the heart. Upon the finale is an ovation from demonkind, as all that remains is death and destruction.

116641030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (10)
During your turn, whenever another allied amulet comes into play, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon a Ruinweb Spider.
----------
During your turn, when this follower comes into play, all enemy followers can't attack until the end of the opponent's turn.
Once on each of the opponent's turns, when the opponent plays a follower, it can't attack until the end of the opponent's turn.
116641030.baseFlair_: Follow not the cursed threads. Their source is illness incarnate, and it spins a web of madness. It speaks in cacophony and abides in distortion. Hear or see it once, and there is no return. Cover your ears; still the sound seeps in. Close your eyes; still the image blazes.
116641030.evoFlair_:
Silver, holy water, even the sun... There is nothing left that can restrain me. You think these tendrils of madness tenacious? Watch me sever them with steel. The moonstruck night is over. And when day breaks, I begin.
—A Vampire with Pure Silver Wings

118641030.baseEffect_:
When this card is added to your hand from your deck, subtract X from its cost. X equals twice the number of times you've played a Bloodsoaked Archdemon using its Accelerate effect.
----------
Accelerate (1): Draw a card. Put a Bloodsoaked Archdemon into your deck.
----------
Rush.
After Clashing with an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, fully restore its defense and deal 5 damage to the enemy leader.
118641030.baseFlair_: They pursue me relentlessly. They rack me and slice at my flesh. I desire naught but love and peace. I do not wish to fight. Devils, O foul devils, begone. Why will you not leave me be?
118641030.evoFlair_: Without warning, they are racked and sliced; there is no time to wail or gnash teeth. Their tormentor calls them devils while begging for mercy; all the while his hands are never idle. He is the devil, a diseased soul trapped in a victimhood of his own making.
